No_DT ._.
1585_CD ._.
FROM_IN A._NNP J._NNP PAYNE_NNP ,_, ESQ._NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Surgeon-General_NNP for_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, TO_NNP THE_NNP SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP THE_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP OF_NNP BENGAL_NNP ,_, MEDICAL_NNP AND_NNP MUNICIPAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ._.
Dated_VBN Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT 20th_CD April_NNP 1880_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honor_NN of_IN reporting_VBG on_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Institutions_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1879_CD ._.
2_CD ._.
In_IN former_JJ reports_NNS on_IN these_DT institutions_NNS ,_, certain_JJ dispensaries_NNS in_IN the_DT suburbs_NNS have_VBP been_VBN included_VBN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP unable_JJ to_TO ascertain_VB the_DT reason_NN of_IN this_DT ,_, and_CC can_MD only_RB suppose_VB that_IN it_PRP was_VBD due_JJ to_TO their_PRP$ neighbouring_JJ situation_NN ._.
They_PRP belong_VBP in_IN position_NN to_TO the_DT 24-Pergunnahs_JJ ;_: they_PRP are_VBP reported_VBN on_IN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP ._.
Surgeon_NN with_IN the_DT other_JJ district_NN dispensaries_NNS ,_, and_CC are_VBP in_IN all_DT respects_NNS under_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN authorities_NNS and_CC local_JJ committees_NNS as_IN the_DT others_NNS are_VBP ._.
Their_PRP$ practice_NN and_CC statistics_NNS are_VBP comparable_JJ with_IN other_JJ district_NN institutions_NNS ,_, rather_RB than_IN with_IN Metropolitan_NNP Hospitals_NNP ._.
They_PRP occupy_VBP the_DT same_JJ position_NN as_IN dispensaries_NNS at_IN sudder_NN stations_NNS in_IN the_DT mofussil_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP not_RB separated_VBN from_IN district_NN dispen-_NN saries_NNS in_IN the_DT reports_NNS ,_, and_CC there_RB seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB no_DT reason_NN for_IN detaching_VBG them_PRP from_IN the_DT local_JJ administration_NN to_TO which_WDT they_PRP belong_VBP ._.
Some_DT of_IN these_DT reasons_NNS would_MD be_VB reasons_NNS also_RB for_IN excluding_VBG the_DT Howrah_NNP General_NNP HÃ³spital_NNP from_IN this_DT report_NN ,_, but_CC there_EX are_VBP others_NNS which_WDT make_VBP its_PRP$ inclusion_NN desirable_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT general_JJ hospital_NN receiving_VBG both_DT European_NNP and_CC Native_NNP patients_NNS ._.
Some_DT of_IN the_DT former_JJ races_NNS are_VBP among_IN the_DT registered_JJ inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, viz_NN ._.
the_DT seamen_NNS of_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ the_DT only_JJ hospital_NN with_IN European_JJ inmates_NNS whose_WP$ finances_NNS are_VBP not_RB directly_RB controlled_VBN by_IN Government_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ useful_JJ for_IN comparison_NN with_IN the_DT general_JJ hospitals_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
I_PRP propose_VBP therefore_RB to_TO deal_VB with_IN the_DT Howrah_NNP Hospital_NNP as_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN dealt_VBN with_IN in_IN former_JJ years_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO treat_VB of_IN the_DT suburban_JJ dispen-_JJ saries_NNS in_IN the_DT general_JJ report_NN on_IN dispensaries_NNS of_IN the_DT province_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
Health_NNP of_IN Calcutta.2_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP 4_CD ._.
The_DT institutions_NNS under_IN report_NN are_VBP named_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ table_NN :_: CALCUTTA_NNP MEDICAL_NNP INSTITUTIONS_NNP ._.
3_CD I_PRP am_VBP unable_JJ to_TO suggest_VB any_DT inferences_NNS from_IN this_DT table_NN ._.
By_IN its_PRP$ form_NN it_PRP purports_VBZ to_TO give_VB data_NNS for_IN estimating_VBG the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN sickness_NN among_IN separate_JJ communities_NNS ,_, but_CC several_JJ considerations_NNS weigh_VBP against_IN this_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT figures_NNS ._.
They_PRP are_VBP themselves_PRP wanting_VBG in_IN precision_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ ,_, if_IN not_RB impossible_JJ ,_, to_TO classify_VB the_DT mixed_JJ inmates_NNS of_IN a_DT Calcutta_NNP hospital_NN with_IN exactness_JJ sufficient_NN for_IN statis-_JJ tical_JJ reckoning_NN ._.
Eurasians_NNS often_RB represent_VBP themselves_PRP to_TO be_VB Europeans_NNPS ,_, and_CC Native_NNP Christians_NNP pass_NN for_IN Eurasians_NNPS ._.
Even_RB if_IN distinction_NN were_VBD clear_JJ enough_RB to_TO admit_VB of_IN comparison_NN with_IN census_NN race_NN numbers_NNS ,_, there_EX would_MD remain_VB a_DT difficulty_NN connected_VBN with_IN the_DT social_JJ classes_NNS to_TO which_WDT hospital_NN patients_NNS belong_RB ,_, a_DT point_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT census_NN itself_PRP is_VBZ confessedly_RB weak_JJ ._.
If_IN we_PRP add_VBP to_TO this_DT the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS is_VBZ affected_VBN by_IN hospital_JJ accommodation_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN some_DT places_NNS even_RB determined_VBN by_IN it_PRP ,_, we_PRP have_VBP a_DT certainty_NN that_IN no_DT statis-_JJ tical_JJ purpose_NN can_MD be_VB served_VBN by_IN analysis_NN of_IN the_DT table_NN ._.
For_IN a_DT similar_JJ reason_NN I_PRP omit_VBP the_DT proportional_JJ tables_NNS hitherto_RB given_VBN to_TO show_VB numbers_NNS per_IN cent_NN which_WDT the_DT several_JJ communities_NNS contribute_VBP to_TO the_DT total_JJ sick_NN ._.

ON_NNP THE_NNP 11_CD ._.
Admission_NN of_IN moribund_NN persons.CALCUTTA_NN MEDICAL_NNP INSTITUTIONS_NNP ._.
7_CD persons_NNS dying_VBG from_IN these_DT conditions_NNS ,_, as_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT bodies_NNS do_VBP not_RB reach_VB the_DT dead-house_NN ;_: but_CC they_PRP are_VBP sufficient_JJ to_TO show_VB the_DT magnitude_NN of_IN the_DT error_NN which_WDT would_MD ascribe_VB the_DT deaths_NNS recorded_VBN in_IN past_JJ years_NNS to_TO the_DT construction_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
14_CD ._.
Enteric_JJ fever_NN in_IN Calcutta.8_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP years_NNS from_IN 1871_CD to_TO 1876_CD ,_, and_CC three_CD only_RB in_IN the_DT succeeding_JJ three_CD years_NNS ._.
Remittent_JJ fever_NN was_VBD much_RB more_RBR prevalent_JJ during_IN the_DT latter_JJ period_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP the_DT numbers_NNS of_IN typhoid_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD uniformly_RB high_JJ ,_, and_CC those_DT of_IN remittent_JJ fever_NN low_NN ._.
At_IN Howrah_NNP typhoid_NN did_VBD not_RB appear_VB in_IN the_DT records_NNS till_NN 1877_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT management_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN passed_VBD into_IN new_JJ hands_NNS ._.
At_IN the_DT Mayo_NNP Hospital_NNP there_EX is_VBZ record_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN during_IN five_CD consecutive_JJ years_NNS and_CC none_NN for_IN the_DT last_JJ three_CD years_NNS ,_, when_WRB remittent_NN fever_NN has_VBZ been_VBN at_IN its_PRP$ highest_JJS point_NN ._.
The_DT most_RBS remarkable_JJ cases_NNS are_VBP those_DT of_IN the_DT Campbell_NNP and_CC Police_NNP Hospitals_NNP ._.
In_IN three_CD years_NNS the_DT Campbell_NNP Hospital_NNP recorded_VBD an_DT extraordinary_JJ number_NN of_IN typhoid_JJ cases_NNS ._.
The_DT disease_NN then_RB ceased_VBD suddenly_RB ,_, and_CC simultane-_JJ ously_RB remittent_JJ fever_NN rose_VBD largely_RB ._.
In_IN the_DT Police_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, where_WRB only_RB the_DT sick_NN of_IN the_DT police_NN force_NN are_VBP received_VBN ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN typhoid_JJ cases_NNS recorded_VBN was_VBD very_RB high_JJ ,_, and_CC remittent_NN fever_NN did_VBD not_RB appear_VB for_IN seven_CD years_NNS ._.
In_IN 1878_CD the_DT management_NN changed_VBD hands_NNS and_CC the_DT order_NN was_VBD reversed_VBN ._.
17_CD ._.
It_PRP seems_VBZ clear_JJ from_IN the_DT foregoing_NN that_IN the_DT general_JJ record_NN of_IN typhoid_JJ fever_NN in_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP hospitals_NNS does_VBZ not_RB present_VB the_DT history_NN of_IN a_DT distinct_JJ disease_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN if_IN the_DT specific_NN fever_NN has_VBZ existed_VBN ,_, of_IN which_WDT there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ doubt_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ to_TO say_VB how_WRB much_JJ or_CC how_WRB little_JJ of_IN it_PRP is_VBZ represented_VBN in_IN the_DT returns_NNS ._.
One_CD physician_NN ,_, finding_VBG that_IN a_DT case_NN entered_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ books_NNS as_IN malarial_JJ fever_NN presents_NNS ,_, during_IN life_NN or_CC after_IN death_NN ,_, some_DT of_IN the_DT appearances_NNS which_WDT attend_VBP the_DT specific_JJ disease_NN ,_, will_MD record_VB the_DT case_NN as_IN specific_NN ;_: another_DT ,_, recognizing_VBG the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT clinical_JJ and_CC pathological_JJ phenomena_NN which_WDT make_VBP up_RP the_DT typhoid_JJ condition_NN often_RB attend_VBP severe_JJ fever_NN of_IN other_JJ origin_NN and_CC are_VBP seen_VBN in_IN disease_NN not_RB usually_RB classed_VBN as_IN febrile_NN at_IN all_DT ,_, will_MD not_RB employ_VB a_DT name_NN which_WDT has_VBZ come_VBN to_TO signify_VB a_DT fever_NN caused_VBN by_IN filth_NN alone_RB ,_, unless_IN he_PRP have_VBP other_JJ evidence_NN of_IN specific_JJ character_NN ._.
18_CD ._.
Again_RB ,_, the_DT records_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN in_IN these_DT large_JJ hospitals_NNS may_MD ,_, in_IN the_DT public_JJ interest_NN ,_, be_VB usefully_RB examined_VBN for_IN evidence_NN of_IN the_DT progress_NN which_WDT the_DT employment_NN of_IN the_DT mixed_JJ cinchona_NN alkaloids_NNS ,_, as_IN a_DT substitute_NN for_IN quinine_NN ,_, is_VBZ making_VBG in_IN large_JJ centres_NNS of_IN medical_JJ practice_NN ._.
The_DT evidence_NN which_WDT I_PRP propose_VBP to_TO submit_VB is_VBZ not_RB that_IN of_IN written_VBN opinion_NN ,_, for_IN in_IN truth_NN the_DT subject_NN is_VBZ not_RB mentioned_VBN in_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT hospital_NN reports_NNS as_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN opinion_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT new_JJ drug_NN has_VBZ been_VBN largely_RB used_VBN ,_, and_CC I_PRP infer_VBP from_IN this_DT that_IN the_DT medical_JJ officers_NNS consider_VBP its_PRP$ value_NN no_RB longer_RBR open_JJ to_TO discussion_NN ._.

4_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN in-door_JJ patients_NNS treated_VBD was_VBD less_RBR in_IN 1879_CD by_IN 5,734_CD as_IN compared_VBN with_IN 1878_CD ,_, and_CC by_IN 1,793_CD as_IN compared_VBN with_IN 1877_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN 1878_CD was_VBD a_DT very_RB unhealthy_JJ year_NN ,_, while_IN in_IN 1877_CD the_DT public_JJ health_NN was_VBD satisfactory_JJ ._.
The_DT lower_JJR figures_NNS in_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Mayo_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Campbell_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT Police_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, are_VBP entirely_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT generally_RB favorable_JJ character_NN of_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP they_PRP are_VBP attributable_JJ partly_RB to_TO the_DT same_JJ cause_NN ,_, and_CC partly_RB to_TO the_DT more_RBR careful_JJ selection_NN of_IN cases_NNS for_IN admission_NN ,_, but_CC chiefly_NN to_TO the_DT falling_VBG off_RP in_IN the_DT shipping_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN seamen_NNS requiring_VBG treat-_JJ ment_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN seamen_NNS admitted_VBN to_TO that_DT hospital_NN during_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT past_JJ four_CD years_NNS was_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: (_( 3_CD )_) 7_CD ._.
The_DT following_VBG table_NN shows_VBZ the_DT general_JJ mortality_NN in_IN hospital_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT town_NN during_IN 1879_CD and_CC the_DT previous_JJ seven_CD years_NNS :_: (_( 4_CD )_) 9_CD ._.
The_DT foregoing_NN statement_NN exhibits_VBZ all_PDT the_DT deaths_NNS ,_, whether_IN the_DT patients_NNS were_VBD classed_VBN as_IN moribund_NN on_IN admission_NN or_CC not_RB ._.
In_IN previous_JJ years_NNS it_PRP was_VBD customary_JJ to_TO class_NN as_IN ``_`` moribund_IN ``_`` all_DT patients_NNS who_WP died_VBD within_IN 24_CD hours_NNS of_IN admission_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO make_VB deductions_NNS from_IN the_DT total_JJ mortality_NN on_IN this_DT account_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Payne_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, holds_VBZ that_IN cholera_NN deaths_NNS occurring_VBG within_IN 24_CD hours_NNS of_IN admission_NN should_MD not_RB go_VB to_TO swell_VB the_DT numbers_NNS of_IN so-called_JJ moribund_NN cases_NNS ._.
If_IN cholera_NN be_VB excluded_VBN ,_, the_DT moribund_NN cases_NNS are_VBP almost_RB entirely_RB native_JJ ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ effect_NN should_MD only_RB be_VB looked_VBN at_IN with_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT native_JJ death-rate_NN ._.
The_DT result_NN in_IN 1879_CD is_VBZ shown_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ table_NN ,_, the_DT figures_NNS in_IN which_WDT can_MD not_RB unfortunately_RB be_VB compared_VBN ,_, as_IN regards_NNS totals_NNS ,_, with_IN those_DT of_IN former_JJ years_NNS ,_, except_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP :_: (_( 5_CD )_) the_DT dead-house_NN for_IN post_NN mortem_NN examination_NN ,_, the_DT facts_NNS prove_VBP ,_, as_IN the_DT Surgeon-_NNP General_NNP argues_VBZ ,_, the_DT magnitude_NN of_IN the_DT error_NN which_WDT in_IN past_JJ years_NNS attributed_VBD all_DT septicÃ¦mic_JJ deaths_NNS to_TO the_DT defective_JJ construction_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
The_DT advocates_NNS of_IN antiseptic_JJ surgery_NN claim_NN for_IN it_PRP that_IN it_PRP prevents_VBZ hospitalism_NN almost_RB entirely_RB ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ hopes_NNS that_IN in_IN future_JJ reports_NNS the_DT experience_NN of_IN the_DT Surgeons_NNP of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, in_IN connection_NN with_IN this_DT question_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB brought_VBN out_RP and_CC examined_VBN by_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_NNP so_RB as_IN to_TO be_VB on_IN record_NN in_IN an_DT easily_RB accessible_JJ form_NN ._.
Meantime_RB an_DT examination_NN of_IN the_DT statistics_NNS given_VBN in_IN the_DT appendix_NN and_CC in_IN former_JJ reports_NNS brings_VBZ out_RP the_DT following_JJ facts_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD certainly_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP 's_POS opinion_NN ,_, deserving_NN of_IN some_DT detailed_JJ examination_NN :_: (_( 6_CD )_) were_VBD admitted_VBN for_IN blindness_NN or_CC absolutely_RB incurable_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT orders_NNS of_IN Government_NNP restricting_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS to_TO 467_CD (_( subject_JJ to_TO certain_JJ exceptions_NNS )_) were_VBD attended_VBN to_TO as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, there_EX were_VBD at_IN one_CD time_NN 508_CD persons_NNS under_IN treatment_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP still_RB many_JJ incurable_JJ cases_NNS of_IN old_JJ standing_NN in_IN the_DT wards_NNS ._.
Of_IN the_DT 32_CD European_JJ deaths_NNS ,_, 12_CD were_VBD caused_VBN by_IN small-pox_NN ,_, 10_CD by_IN dysentery_NN and_CC diarrh_NN (_( 7_CD )_) The_DT returns_NNS for_IN 1879_CD are_VBP ,_, Dr._NNP Payne_NNP observes_VBZ ,_, silent_JJ as_IN to_TO the_DT ``_`` acute_NN (_( 8_CD )_) Native_NNP and_CC European_NNP ,_, they_PRP will_MD be_VB reconsidered_VBN ;_: but_CC at_IN present_JJ there_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN they_PRP are_VBP not_RB sufficient_JJ to_TO provide_VB this_DT ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-_NNP Governor_NNP would_MD also_RB wish_VB to_TO see_VB the_DT cooking_NN for_IN the_DT European_JJ patients_NNS improved_VBN at_IN this_DT hospital_NN ._.
22_CD ._.
At_IN the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP the_DT expenditure_NN on_IN establishment_NN ,_, though_IN less_JJR than_IN in_IN 1878_CD ,_, is_VBZ still_RB high_JJ for_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS ._.
But_CC as_IN these_DT are_VBP all_DT Europeans_NNS ,_, some_DT excess_JJ might_MD be_VB expected_VBN ._.
The_DT average_JJ daily_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT diet_NN at_IN the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP was_VBD 7_CD annas_JJ 10_CD pies_NNS reckoned_VBN on_IN both_DT paying_VBG and_CC pauper_JJ patients_NNS ._.
The_DT expenditure_NN on_IN medicines_NNS and_CC miscellaneous_JJ items_NNS was_VBD less_JJR than_IN in_IN 1878_CD ._.
This_DT hospital_NN in_IN every_DT department_NN shows_VBZ the_DT good_JJ results_NNS of_IN careful_JJ management_NN and_CC personal_JJ administrative_JJ supervision_NN ._.
23_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Campbell_NNP Hospital_NNP the_DT establishment_NN was_VBD increased_VBN to_TO provide_VB proper_JJ attendance_NN in_IN the_DT European_JJ small-pox_NN wards_NNS ._.
There_EX was_VBD a_DT trifling_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT cost_NN of_IN native_JJ diets_NNS ,_, the_DT daily_JJ average_NN being_VBG 2_CD annas_NNS 7.3_CD pies_NNS against_IN 2_CD annas_NNS 6_CD pies_NNS in_IN 1878_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ charge_NN for_IN diets_NNS was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
24,086_CD ,_, against_IN Rs_NNP ._.
31,348_CD in_IN 1877_CD ,_, for_IN a_DT much_RB smaller_JJR number_NN of_IN patients_NNS ._.
24_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Police_NNP Hospital_NNP the_DT general_JJ cost_NN was_VBD reduced_VBN ,_, though_IN the_DT diet_JJ scale_NN was_VBD increased_VBN ._.
The_DT average_JJ daily_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT diet_NN was_VBD 2_CD annas_JJ 9_CD pies_NNS ,_, a_DT fact_NN which_WDT shows_VBZ that_IN the_DT College_NNP Hospital_NNP rates_NNS are_VBP not_RB unduly_RB low_JJ ._.
Every_DT policeman_NN unfit_NN for_IN duty_NN ,_, however_RB trivial_JJ or_CC temporary_JJ his_PRP$ ailment_NN ,_, is_VBZ admitted_VBN to_TO the_DT Police_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN full_JJ diets_NNS must_MD therefore_RB be_VB greater_JJR in_IN proportion_NN than_IN in_IN any_DT other_JJ institution_NN ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, many_JJ of_IN the_DT men_NNS were_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG only_RB from_IN under-feeding_JJ and_CC parsimonious_JJ living_NN common_JJ among_IN up-countrymen_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ class_NN ._.
These_DT patients_NNS had_VBD of_IN course_NN to_TO be_VB fed_VBN up_RP ._.
Yet_CC the_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN diets_NNS in_IN the_DT Police_NNP Hospital_NNP is_VBZ perceptibly_RB less_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT College_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT proportionate_NN number_NN of_IN low_JJ and_CC reduced_JJ diets_NNS in_IN serious_JJ cases_NNS is_VBZ far_RB greater_JJR ._.
25_CD ._.
The_DT charges_NNS of_IN the_DT Mayo_NNP Hospital_NNP and_CC its_PRP$ dependencies_NNS in_IN respect_NN of_IN establishment_NN and_CC manaement_NN rose_VBD somewhat_RB ._.
European_JJ subscriptions_NNS and_CC other_JJ donations_NNS showed_VBD a_DT large_JJ falling_VBG off_RP ,_, and_CC the_DT Government_NNP expenditure_NN on_IN medical_JJ stores_NNS increased_VBD ._.
The_DT Surgeon-General_JJ draws_NN attention_NN to_TO the_DT heavy_NN charges_NNS made_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN this_DT and_CC other_JJ institutions_NNS by_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Store_NNP Department_NNP for_IN out-patient_JJ tickets_NNS ._.
Steps_NNS should_MD ,_, as_IN suggested_VBN ,_, be_VB taken_VBN by_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_JJ ,_, in_IN communication_NN with_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN Government_NNP Printing_NNP ,_, for_IN having_VBG them_PRP more_RBR cheaply_RB printed_VBN ._.
If_IN this_DT is_VBZ done_VBN ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-_NNP Governor_NNP thinks_VBZ that_IN it_PRP would_MD probably_RB simplify_VB the_DT accounts_NNS of_IN the_DT Mayo_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC place_NN matters_NNS on_IN a_DT more_RBR satisfactory_JJ footing_NN ,_, if_IN Government_NNP made_VBD it_PRP an_DT annual_JJ money_NN grant_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN its_PRP$ medicines_NNS ,_, instruments_NNS ,_, and_CC forms_NNS ;_: the_DT hospital_NN receiving_VBG these_DT on_IN payable_JJ indent_NN as_IN other_JJ aided_VBD institutions_NNS now_RB do_VBP ,_, or_CC providing_VBG itself_PRP with_IN them_PRP from_IN England_NNP direct_NN ._.
The_DT Surgeon-General_NNP is_VBZ requested_VBN to_TO consider_VB what_WP the_DT amount_NN of_IN such_JJ a_DT grant_NN should_MD be_VB ,_, and_CC to_TO place_VB himself_PRP in_IN communication_NN with_IN the_DT governing_VBG body_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, in_IN view_NN to_TO arranging_VBG this_DT matter_NN on_IN an_DT equitable_JJ basis_NN ._.
The_DT average_JJ daily_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT native_JJ diet_NN in_IN this_DT hospital_NN was_VBD 2_CD annas_JJ 8_CD pies_NNS ,_, or_CC less_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT College_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, yet_RB no_DT complaints_NNS have_VBP ever_RB been_VBN made_VBN of_IN the_DT insufficiency_NN of_IN the_DT scale_NN ._.
26_CD ._.
The_DT Government_NNP expenditure_NN on_IN the_DT Howrah_NNP Hospital_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN was_VBD increased_VBN by_IN a_DT special_JJ building_NN grant_NN ._.
The_DT income_NN from_IN paying_VBG patients_NNS and_CC the_DT municipality_NN rose_VBD slightly_RB ,_, but_CC private_JJ subscriptions_NNS fell_VBD off_RP considerably_RB ._.
The_DT total_JJ expenditure_NN on_IN diets_NNS was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
5,498_CD ,_, against_IN Rs_NNP ._.
10,585_CD in_IN 1878_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD discovered_VBN in_IN 1870_CD that_IN a_DT fraudulent_JJ system_NN of_IN treating_VBG the_DT diet-roll_NN had_VBD been_VBN going_VBG on_IN ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT cashier_NN ,_, the_DT diet-roll_NN clerk_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT sircar_NN were_VBD concerned_VBN ._.
Proper_JJ checks_NNS have_VBP now_RB been_VBN applied_VBN ._.
The_DT average_JJ daily_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT European_NNP diet_NN in_IN 1879_CD was_VBD 7_CD annas_JJ 4_CD pies_NNS against_IN 9_CD annas_NNS 4_CD pies_NNS in_IN 1878_CD ._.
The_DT cost_NN of_IN native_JJ diets_NNS was_VBD the_DT same_JJ in_IN both_DT years_NNS ,_, viz_NN ._.
1_CD anna_JJ 7_CD pies_NNS ._.
The_DT Surgeon-_NNP General_NNP personally_RB inquired_VBD into_IN the_DT causes_NNS of_IN the_DT very_RB low_JJ diet_JJ rate_NN for_IN natives_NNS at_IN the_DT Howrah_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC found_VBD that_IN it_PRP was_VBD accounted_VBN for_IN by_IN the_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN moribund_NN cases_NNS admitted_VBD when_WRB too_RB far_RB gone_VBN to_TO swallow_VB anything_NN ._.
To_TO press_VB such_JJ patients_NNS with_IN food_NN or_CC stimulants_NNS would_MD ,_, as_IN the_DT Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP in_IN charge_NN explained_VBD ,_, cause_NN only_RB needless_JJ distress_NN ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP must_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, see_VBP that_IN patients_NNS who_WP are_VBP able_JJ to_TO take_VB food_NN are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO want_VB nothing_NN which_WDT their_PRP$ cases_NNS require_VBP ._.

Race_NN and_CC Sex.4_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP only_RB ,_, and_CC children_NNS at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN 85_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN children_NNS treated_VBN was_VBD small_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT adult_NN death-rate_NN was_VBD not_RB much_RB exceeded_VBN by_IN the_DT general_JJ rate_NN in_IN consequence_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD affected_VBN in_IN some_DT degree_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Campbell_NNP Hospital_NNP the_DT adult_NN death-rate_NN was_VBD 234_CD per_IN thousand_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN of_IN children_NNS 150_CD ._.
This_DT difference_NN would_MD be_VB expected_VBN from_IN the_DT condition_NN of_IN adults_NNS received_VBN into_IN this_DT hospital_NN ._.

The_DT effect_NN on_IN the_DT general_JJ rates_NNS was_VBD insignificant_JJ from_IN the_DT numbers_NNS ._.

The_DT total_JJ death-rate_JJ given_VBN in_IN the_DT table_NN is_VBZ 138.17_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT fractional_JJ difference_NN is_VBZ now_RB explained_VBN ._.

8_CD ._.

21_CD ._.
The_DT First_NNP Surgeon_NNP had_VBD 26_CD operations_NNS ,_, nine_CD of_IN which_WDT were_VBD treated_VBN on_IN the_DT old_JJ method_NN and_CC 17_CD by_IN the_DT antiseptic_JJ system_NN ._.

only_RB ._.

Dr._NNP Coates_NNP adds_VBZ :_: ``_`` It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN urged_VBN in_IN support_NN of_IN Lister_NNP 's_POS system_NN in_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN these_DT cases_NNS ,_, that_IN it_PRP reduces_VBZ the_DT death-rate_NN ,_, obviates_VBZ putrefactive_JJ changes_NNS in_IN the_DT wound_NN ,_, and_CC septic_JJ contamination_NN of_IN the_DT system_NN ;_: that_IN it_PRP sup-_JJ presses_VBZ all_DT constitutional_JJ disturbance_NN ,_, and_CC materially_RB accelerates_VBZ healing_NN ,_, thereby_RB contracting_VBG the_DT period_NN of_IN treatment_NN ._.
It_PRP thus_RB counterbalances_NNS by_IN saving_VBG in_IN the_DT patient_NN 's_POS diet_JJ the_DT expense_NN which_WDT the_DT system_NN entails_VBZ ._. ''_''
The_DT following_JJ facts_NNS bear_VBP upon_IN the_DT last_JJ point_NN ._.
The_DT average_JJ weight_NN of_IN the_DT tumours_NNS removed_VBN in_IN former_JJ years_NNS was_VBD 142_CD ounces_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT patients_NNS were_VBD under_IN treatment_NN on_IN an_DT average_JJ 90_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT average_JJ weight_NN in_IN 1880_CD was_VBD 60_CD ounces_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT average_JJ period_NN was_VBD 72_CD days_NNS There_EX is_VBZ no_DT evidence_NN of_IN shortened_JJ duration_NN here_RB ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT whole_JJ I_PRP think_VBP but_CC little_JJ advantage_NN can_MD at_IN present_JJ be_VB claimed_VBN for_IN Lister_NNP 's_POS system_NN in_IN this_DT class_NN of_IN cases_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT special_JJ report_NN appended_VBD ,_, Dr._NNP McLeod_NNP points_VBZ out_RP that_IN the_DT wounds_NNS after_IN scrotal_JJ operation_NN are_VBP with_IN great_JJ difficulty_NN kept_VBD in_IN an_DT aseptic_JJ state_NN ,_, being_VBG particularly_RB prone_NN to_TO become_VB the_DT nidus_NN of_IN septic_JJ infection_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ quite_RB intelligible_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP may_MD be_VB wrong_JJ to_TO estimate_VB the_DT general_JJ value_NN of_IN the_DT system_NN by_IN so_RB severe_JJ a_DT test_NN ;_: but_CC if_IN it_PRP should_MD appear_VB that_IN in_IN these_DT same_JJ difficult_JJ cases_NNS results_NNS as_IN good_JJ or_CC better_JJR are_VBP obtainable_JJ by_IN the_DT former_JJ system_NN ,_, the_DT difficulty_NN will_MD not_RB save_VB the_DT credit_NN of_IN strict_JJ Listerism_NNP ;_: but_CC the_DT generally_RB better_JJR results_NNS of_IN late_JJ years_NNS will_MD point_VB rather_RB to_TO those_DT collateral_JJ improvements_NNS which_WDT Dr._NNP Raye_NNP shows_VBZ to_TO have_VB accompanied_VBN antiseptic_JJ practiceCALCUTTA_NN MEDICAL_NNP INSTITUTIONS_NNP ._.
15_CD 23_CD ._.

I_PRP USE_VBP the_DT word_NN septicÃ¦mia_NN in_IN its_PRP$ fullest_JJS sense_NN ,_, including_VBG pyÃ¦mia_NN proper_NN ,_, and_CC even_RB the_DT mildest_JJS forms_NNS of_IN erysipelas_NN ._.
By_IN antiseptics_NNS I_PRP mean_VBP the_DT method_NN of_IN dressing_VBG wounds_NNS introduced_VBN by_IN Professor_NNP Lister_NNP ,_, and_CC mainly_RB consisting_VBG of_IN a_DT free_JJ use_NN of_IN carbolic_JJ acid_NN in_IN various_JJ ways_NNS ._.

RESOLUTION_NNP ._.
READ_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) Hospital_NN ,_, and_CC 3,443_CD at_IN the_DT Mayo_NNP Hospital_NNP and_CC its_PRP$ attached_JJ dispensaries_NNS ._.
A_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT increase_NN at_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP was_VBD doubtless_JJ due_JJ to_TO the_DT opening_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ out-door_JJ dispensary_NN on_IN 1st_CD July_NNP ._.
The_DT general_JJ death-rate_NN at_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP hospitals_NNS was_VBD 134.17_CD per_IN mille_NN against_IN 155.62_CD in_IN 1879_CD ._.
If_IN the_DT Howrah_NNP figures_NNS are_VBP included_VBN ,_, the_DT rate_NN was_VBD 138.17_CD against_IN 162.2_CD ._.
A_DT decrease_NN is_VBZ shown_VBN at_IN all_DT except_IN the_DT Mayo_NNP hospital_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT rate_NN rose_VBD from_IN 139.36_CD to_TO 143.19_CD ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT figures_NNS showing_VBG the_DT races_NNS and_CC sexes_NNS of_IN the_DT persons_NNS treated_VBN in_IN the_DT different_JJ years_NNS are_VBP of_IN little_JJ value_NN for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN comparison_NN ._.
The_DT native_JJ races_NNS appear_VBP to_TO resort_VB to_TO the_DT hospitals_NNS in_IN much_JJ the_DT same_JJ proportion_NN year_NN after_IN year_NN ._.
The_DT proportion_NN of_IN male_NN to_TO female_JJ adults_NNS is_VBZ about_RB 4_CD to_TO 1_CD ._.
Out_IN of_IN 163,925_CD adult_NN males_NNS treated_VBD 15,584_CD ,_, and_CC out_IN of_IN 40,563_CD adult_NN females_NNS 4,298_CD ,_, were_VBD in-patients_NNS ._.
Only_RB 1,069_CD children_NNS out_IN of_IN 68,537_CD were_VBD treated_VBN in_IN hospital_NN ._.
The_DT death-rate_NN among_IN adults_NNS was_VBD 138.6_CD ,_, and_CC among_IN children_NNS only_RB 133_CD ;_: but_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN the_DT latter_NN was_VBD so_RB small_JJ that_IN the_DT general_JJ death-rate_NN is_VBZ only_RB reduced_VBN to_TO 138.17_CD ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT following_VBG table_NN shows_VBZ the_DT mortality_NN in_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS during_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT past_JJ eight_CD years_NNS :_: (_( 3_CD )_) 136_CD in_IN 1876_CD ,_, 152_CD in_IN 1875_CD ,_, and_CC 125_CD in_IN 1874_CD ._.
Though_IN there_EX was_VBD an_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN persons_NNS treated_VBN in_IN the_DT European_JJ wards_NNS ,_, there_EX was_VBD a_DT decrease_NN in_IN the_DT purely_JJ European_JJ element_NN ,_, the_DT sailors_NNS from_IN the_DT port_NN resorting_VBG chiefly_NN to_TO the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT increase_NN took_VBD place_NN among_IN the_DT more_RBR weakly_JJ classes_NNS of_IN East_NNP Indians_NNPS ,_, Chinese_NNP ,_, Jews_NNP ,_, and_CC Armenians_NNPS ,_, and_CC the_DT death-rate_NN was_VBD doubtless_RB less_RBR favourable_JJ in_IN consequence_NN than_IN it_PRP would_MD otherwise_RB have_VB been_VBN ._.
The_DT native_JJ death-rate_NN of_IN 195.15_CD is_VBZ calculated_VBN on_IN all_DT cases_NNS ._.
If_IN moribund_VBN and_CC cholera_NN cases_NNS are_VBP excluded_VBN ,_, the_DT native_JJ death-rate_NN was_VBD 149.55_CD against_IN 140.6_CD in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN the_DT native_JJ death-rate_NN was_VBD affected_VBN by_IN the_DT circumstance_NN that_WDT fewer_JJR pauper_NN patients_NNS could_MD be_VB transferred_VBN to_TO the_DT Campbell_NNP Hospital_NNP owing_VBG to_TO want_VB of_IN accommodation_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN transferred_VBN was_VBD only_RB 537_CD against_IN 902_CD in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT 588_CD persons_NNS who_WP died_VBD ,_, 69_CD were_VBD children_NNS ._.
The_DT children_NNS died_VBD at_IN the_DT same_JJ rate_NN as_IN the_DT adults_NNS ._.
Of_IN the_DT 169_CD deaths_NNS among_IN Europeans_NNPS ,_, 22_CD were_VBD caused_VBN by_IN fever_NN ,_, 14_CD by_IN phthisis_NN ,_, 13_CD by_IN diseases_NNS of_IN the_DT respiratory_NN organs_NNS ,_, 11_CD by_IN dysentery_NN ,_, and_CC 11_CD by_IN diarrh_NN (_( 4_CD )_) 10_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Howrah_NNP Hospital_NNP 612_CD Europeans_NNPS and_CC East_NNP Indians_NNP ,_, and_CC 945_CD natives_NNS ,_, were_VBD treated_VBN ,_, against_IN 594_CD and_CC 1,176_CD respectively_RB ._.
Of_IN 56_CD children_NNS treated_VBD ,_, 12_CD died_VBD ;_: the_DT rate_NN was_VBD thus_RB 214_CD per_IN mile_NN ._.
The_DT death-rate_NN among_IN adults_NNS was_VBD 186_CD ._.
The_DT general_JJ rate_NN was_VBD thus_RB raised_VBN to_TO 188_CD ._.
The_DT death-rate_NN among_IN the_DT European_JJ class_NN was_VBD 29_CD against_IN 53_CD in_IN 1879_CD ,_, 55_CD in_IN 1878_CD ,_, and_CC 39_CD in_IN 1877_CD ._.
Among_IN natives_NNS the_DT death-rate_NN was_VBD 292_CD ,_, against_IN 332_CD ,_, 346_CD ,_, and_CC 252_CD respectively_RB in_IN the_DT three_CD previous_JJ years_NNS ._.
More_JJR than_IN one-fifth_NN of_IN the_DT deaths_NNS among_IN native_JJ patients_NNS occurred_VBD during_IN the_DT first_JJ 24_CD hours_NNS after_IN admission_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ notorious_JJ that_IN coolies_NNS from_IN the_DT interior_NN ,_, who_WP have_VBP been_VBN employed_VBN in_IN the_DT mills_NNS and_CC workshops_NNS at_IN Howrah_NNP ,_, generally_RB go_VBP to_TO the_DT hospital_NN only_RB in_IN the_DT last_JJ extremity_NN ._.
If_IN cholera_NN and_CC moribund_NN cases_NNS are_VBP excluded_VBN ,_, the_DT death-rate_NN is_VBZ reduced_VBN to_TO 243_CD in_IN 1880_CD and_CC 287_CD in_IN 1879_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT 18_CD Europeans_NNPS and_CC Eurasians_NNPS 4_CD died_VBD of_IN cholera_NN ,_, 3_CD of_IN phthisis_NN ,_, and_CC 3_CD of_IN dysentery_NN ._.
Among_IN natives_NNS 33_CD died_VBD of_IN fever_NN out_IN of_IN 202_CD ,_, 18_CD of_IN cholera_NN out_IN of_IN 29_CD ,_, 8_CD of_IN dropsy_NN out_IN of_IN 22_CD ;_: 53_CD of_IN dysentery_NN out_IN of_IN 111_CD ,_, 101_CD of_IN diarrh_NN (_( 5_CD )_) affection_NN is_VBZ clearly_RB established_VBN ._.
Whether_IN that_DT decrease_NN has_VBZ or_CC has_VBZ not_RB resulted_VBN from_IN the_DT employment_NN of_IN Professor_NNP Lister_NNP 's_POS system_NN proper_NN is_VBZ not_RB so_RB clear_JJ ._.
Dr._NNP McLeod_NNP treated_VBD to_TO conclusion_VB 20_CD cases_NNS of_IN scrotal_JJ tumour_NN (_( 6_CD )_) have_VBP been_VBN no_DT cases_NNS since_IN 1876_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT Campbell_NNP Hospital_NNP none_NN since_IN 1874_CD ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT enteric_JJ fever_NN in_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
There_EX were_VBD 2_CD cases_NNS in_IN 1879_CD ,_, and_CC from_IN 1871_CD to_TO 1877_CD cases_NNS were_VBD regularly_RB recorded_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ doubtful_JJ if_IN these_DT were_VBD all_DT really_RB cases_NNS of_IN enteric_JJ fever_NN ._.
16_CD ._.
The_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT cinchona_NN febrifuge_NN in_IN substitution_NN for_IN quinine_JJ con-_JJ tinues_NNS to_TO increase_VB ._.
Of_IN the_DT former_JJ ,_, 161lbs_CD and_CC of_IN the_DT latter_JJ 19lbs_CD were_VBD used_VBN ._.
In_IN 1876_CD the_DT proportions_NNS were_VBD 1lb_CD and_CC 195lbs_CD respectively_RB ,_, and_CC in_IN 1877_CD 47lbs_CD and_CC 101lbs_CD ._.
The_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT febrifuge_NN has_VBZ now_RB been_VBN definitely_RB established_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT public_JJ demand_NN for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ increasing_VBG daily_RB ._.

FROM_IN A.J.PAYNE_NNP ,_, ESQ._NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Surgeon-General_NNP for_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_NNP SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP THE_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP OF_NNP BENGAL_NNP ,_, MUNICIPAL_NNP AND_NNP MEDICAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ._.
Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT 18th_CD April_NNP 1882_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honour_NN of_IN reporting_VBG as_IN follows_VBZ on_IN the_DT state_NN of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Institutions_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP in_IN the_DT year_NN 1881_CD ._.
The_DT condition_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN itself_PRP ,_, in_IN respect_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS prevalent_JJ diseases_NNS ,_, is_VBZ shown_VBN in_IN the_DT subjoined_JJ table:2_JJ REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP homes_NNS in_IN the_DT interior_NN ._.
The_DT fever_NN figures_NNS are_VBP more_RBR vitiated_JJ by_IN this_DT habit_NN than_IN those_DT of_IN any_DT other_JJ disease_NN ,_, and_CC though_IN comparison_NN of_IN ordinary_JJ years_NNS in_IN series_NN ,_, one_CD with_IN another_DT ,_, may_MD hold_VB good_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB certain_JJ that_IN ,_, in_IN any_DT single_JJ year_NN ,_, a_DT large_JJ accession_NN of_IN fatal_JJ fever_NN may_MD occur_VB without_IN affecting_VBG the_DT death_NN records_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
Whether_NNP such_JJ accession_NN did_VBD or_CC did_VBD not_RB take_VB place_NN in_IN 1881_CD can_MD not_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, be_VB learnt_VBN from_IN the_DT aggregate_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN the_DT above_NN table_NN ._.
Some_DT indi-_JJ cation_NN may_MD be_VB obtained_VBN from_IN separate_JJ scrutiny_NN of_IN death_NN lists_NNS in_IN those_DT town_NN sections_NNS which_WDT are_VBP known_VBN to_TO contain_VB the_DT largest_JJS proportions_NNS of_IN fixed_JJ residents_NNS ,_, and_CC from_IN fever_JJ mortality_NN among_IN married_JJ women_NNS and_CC children_NNS ,_, who_WP represent_VBP fixed_VBN households_NNS ._.
The_DT evidence_NN of_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS in_IN 1881_CD is_VBZ at_IN variance_NN with_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT general_JJ town_NN record_NN ,_, for_IN although_IN the_DT entire_JJ number_NN of_IN fever_NN cases_NNS treated_VBD was_VBD considerably_RB less_JJR than_IN in_IN 1880_CD ,_, chiefly_VBP from_IN want_NN of_IN space_NN in_IN the_DT Campbell_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, the_DT actual_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS was_VBD larger_JJR ,_, and_CC the_DT death-rate_JJ consider-_NN ably_RB higher_RBR ,_, than_IN in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ._.
A_DT true_JJ record_NN of_IN deaths_NNS caused_VBN in_IN the_DT town_NN would_MD probably_RB show_VB no_DT variance_NN with_IN the_DT hospital_NN figures_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ at_IN present_JJ probable_JJ that_IN there_EX was_VBD more_JJR fatal_JJ fever_NN in_IN Calcutta_NNP than_IN before_RB ,_, but_CC nothing_NN at_IN all_DT resembling_VBG its_PRP$ prevalence_NN in_IN the_DT districts_NNS epidemically_RB affected_VBD ._.

In_IN 1881_CD ,_, moreover_RB ,_, the_DT Mayo_NNP Hospital_NNP showed_VBD an_DT increase_NN over_IN 1880_CD nearly_RB as_RB large_JJ as_IN was_VBD shown_VBN in_IN 1880_CD over_IN 1879_CD ,_, and_CC much_RB larger_JJR than_IN the_DT increase_NN at_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP ._.

MEDICAL_NNP &_CC MUNICIPAL_NNP DEPT_NNP ._.
MEDICAL_NNP ._.
DARJEELING_NN ,_, THE_DT 22ND_CD JUNE_NNP 1882_CD ._.
RESOLUTION_NNP ._.
READ_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) The_DT number_NN of_IN in-patients_NNS fell_VBD from_IN 21,458_CD in_IN 1880_CD to_TO 20,764_CD during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN review_NN ._.
The_DT decrease_NN was_VBD confined_VBN to_TO the_DT Campbell_NNP Hospital_NNP (_( 807_CD )_) and_CC the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP (_( 305_CD )_) ._.
There_EX was_VBD an_DT increase_NN of_IN 292_CD at_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP and_CC an_DT increase_NN of_IN 83_CD at_IN Howrah_NNP ,_, while_IN in_IN the_DT Mayo_NNP and_CC Police_NNP Hospitals_NNP the_DT numbers_NNS were_VBD practically_RB unchanged_JJ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ explained_VBN that_IN only_RB a_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT Campbell_NNP Hospital_NNP building_NN was_VBD available_JJ for_IN patients_NNS during_IN several_JJ months_NNS owing_VBG to_TO the_DT extensive_JJ repair_NN works_NNS that_WDT were_VBD being_VBG carried_VBN out_RP ._.
Part_NN of_IN the_DT increase_NN at_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP is_VBZ attributed_VBN to_TO this_DT cause_NN ._.
Out-door_JJ patients_NNS are_VBP treated_VBN only_RB at_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP and_CC the_DT Mayo_NNP and_CC Howrah_NNP Hospitals_NNP ._.
There_EX was_VBD an_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT two_CD former_JJ of_IN 1,210_CD and_CC 3,097_CD respectively_RB ,_, while_IN at_IN Howrah_NNP there_EX was_VBD a_DT falling_VBG off_IN of_IN 834_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ increase_NN over_IN the_DT numbers_NNS of_IN 1880_CD was_VBD therefore_RB 3,473_CD ._.
The_DT out-door_JJ practice_NN of_IN the_DT Mayo_NNP Hospital_NNP and_CC its_PRP$ associated_JJ dispensaries_NNS was_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: (_( 3_CD )_) were_VBD more_RBR severe_JJ ,_, as_IN they_PRP were_VBD in_IN the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
This_DT points_VBZ to_TO sailors_NNS as_IN the_DT chief_JJ sufferers_NNS ._.
In_IN respiratory_JJ affections_NNS there_EX was_VBD but_CC a_DT trifling_JJ difference_NN from_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, either_CC in_IN quantity_NN or_CC fatality_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT same_JJ is_VBZ true_JJ of_IN dysentery_NN and_CC diarrh_NN (_( 4_CD )_) 7_CD ._.
The_DT educational_JJ aspect_NN of_IN the_DT question_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN lost_VBN sight_NN of_IN ._.
Even_RB after_IN liberal_JJ allowance_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN for_IN the_DT lessened_JJ use_NN of_IN expensive_JJ articles_NNS of_IN diet_NN ,_, the_DT cost_NN of_IN strict_JJ Listerian_JJ treatment_NN is_VBZ admittedly_RB much_JJ greater_JJR than_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ methods_NNS ;_: spray_NN producers_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP essential_JJ to_TO its_PRP$ application_NN ,_, are_VBP costly_JJ and_CC fragile_JJ ,_, and_CC can_MD only_RB be_VB properly_RB used_VBN with_IN skilled_JJ assistance_NN ;_: and_CC however_RB great_JJ the_DT value_NN of_IN this_DT treatment_NN may_MD be_VB ,_, when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ applied_VBN with_IN care_NN and_CC skill_NN ,_, and_CC without_IN regard_NN to_TO cost_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT hope_NN of_IN its_PRP$ being_VBG within_IN the_DT reach_NN of_IN the_DT mass_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN of_IN these_DT provinces_NNS ._.
The_DT pupils_NNS whose_WP$ medical_JJ training_NN is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT chief_JJ functions_NNS of_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP hospitals_NNS will_MD seldom_RB be_VB called_VBN on_IN to_TO practise_VB Listerism_NNP in_IN afterlife_NN ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ practical_JJ usefulness_NN would_MD be_VB much_RB impaired_VBN if_IN they_PRP were_VBD taught_VBN to_TO look_VB upon_IN the_DT costly_JJ appliances_NNS of_IN the_DT system_NN as_IN indispensable_JJ ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN in-patients_NNS treated_VBN by_IN the_DT Obstetric_NNP Physician_NNP shows_VBZ a_DT considerable_JJ falling_VBG off_RP ,_, being_VBG only_RB 1,008_CD in_IN 1881_CD against_IN 1,277_CD ,_, 1,204_CD ,_, 1,238_CD ,_, 1,109_CD ,_, and_CC 1,155_CD in_IN the_DT five_CD preceding_NN years_NNS ._.
There_EX were_VBD 6,500_CD out-patients_NNS during_IN the_DT first_JJ six_CD months_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT cases_NNS treated_VBD during_IN the_DT second-_JJ half_NN have_VBP been_VBN amalgamated_VBN with_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT general_JJ out-door_JJ dispensary_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Ophthalmic_NNP Hospital_NNP 608_CD persons_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, of_IN whom_WP 555_CD were_VBD fresh_JJ admissions_NNS ._.
Of_IN these_DT ,_, 299_CD were_VBD cured_VBN and_CC 188_CD relieved_VBN ._.
Three_CD hundred_CD and_CC sixty_JJ operations_NNS were_VBD performed_VBN ,_, of_IN which_WDT 218_CD resulted_VBD in_IN cures_NNS ,_, while_IN 88_CD persons_NNS were_VBD relieved_VBN ._.
Besides_IN these_DT ,_, 6,505_CD out-patients_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
The_DT following_VBG table_NN shows_VBZ the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN enteric_JJ and_CC remit-_JJ tent_NN fever_NN treated_VBN in_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS in_IN each_DT year_NN since_IN 1872_CD :_: (_( 5_CD )_) 251_CD minor_JJ operations_NNS were_VBD performed_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT latrine_JJ accommo-_JJ dation_NN is_VBZ reported_VBN to_TO be_VB defective_JJ ._.
This_DT should_MD receive_VB the_DT immediate_JJ attention_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, and_CC no_DT time_NN should_MD be_VB lost_VBN in_IN getting_VBG it_PRP put_VBD on_IN a_DT proper_JJ footing_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Birch_NNP considers_VBZ that_IN the_DT diet_NN is_VBZ ``_`` certainly_RB liberal_JJ ,_, ``_`` and_CC reports_NNS that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ never_RB had_VBD a_DT complaint_NN from_IN a_DT patient_NN since_IN he_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN charge_NN ._.
13_CD ._.
At_IN the_DT Campbell_NNP Hospital_NNP the_DT number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS fell_VBD to_TO 6,074_CD ._.
The_DT decrease_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT reduction_NN of_IN available_JJ space_NN ,_, occasioned_VBN by_IN the_DT repairs_NNS which_WDT were_VBD in_IN progress_NN for_IN over_IN five_CD months_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Malarious_JJ fever_NN was_VBD the_DT most_RBS prevalent_JJ disease_NN ,_, and_CC contributed_VBD 1,491_CD cases_NNS ._.
Next_RB in_IN order_NN came_VBD dysentery_RB ,_, diarrh_NN (_( 6_CD )_) for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN ._.

29,752_CD to_TO Rs_NNP ._.
25,787_CD ._.
The_DT reduction_NN is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO be_VB due_JJ chiefly_NN to_TO the_DT cheapness_NN of_IN pro-_JJ visions_NNS in_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN review_NN ._.
The_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT diet_NN for_IN Europeans_NNPS was_VBD 6_CD annas_NNS against_IN 6_CD annas_NNS 6_CD pies_NNS in_IN 1880_CD ,_, and_CC for_IN natives_NNS it_PRP was_VBD 2_CD annas_JJ 6_CD pies_NNS against_IN 2_CD annas_NNS 10_CD pies_NNS ._.

9,915_CD to_TO Rs_NNP ._.

Particular_JJ diseases.CALCUTTA_NN MEDICAL_NNP INSTITUTIONS_NNP ._.

14_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ surgeon_NN 's_POS ward_NN at_IN the_DT college_NN hospital_NN ,_, Dr._NNP McLeod_NNP reports_VBZ a_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN 127_CD operations_NNS with_IN 9_CD deaths_NNS ,_, showing_VBG marked_JJ im-_JJ provement_NN on_IN past_JJ years_NNS ._.
He_PRP ascribes_VBZ this_DT to_TO the_DT absence_NN of_IN hospitalism_NN ,_, the_DT more_JJR thorough_JJ use_NN of_IN antiseptics_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN some_DT measure_NN to_TO the_DT absence_NN of_IN desperate_JJ cases_NNS requiring_VBG operation_NN in_IN the_DT last_JJ resort_NN ._.
All_PDT the_DT deaths_NNS are_VBP satis-_JJ factorily_RB explained_VBN as_IN beyond_IN prevention_NN ._.
Dr._NNP McLeod_NNP says_VBZ that_IN the_DT favour-_JJ able_JJ results_NNS were_VBD not_RB due_JJ to_TO any_DT exceptional_JJ paucity_NN of_IN severe_JJ operations_NNS ,_, though_IN a_DT large_JJ majority_NN presented_VBN fair_JJ promise_NN of_IN recovery_NN ._.

Thus_RB in_IN 1882_CD there_EX were_VBD 16_CD operations_NNS for_IN excision_NN of_IN bones_NNS and_CC joints_NNS with_IN 3_CD deaths_NNS ._.
In_IN 1881_CD there_EX were_VBD 11_CD operations_NNS with_IN one_CD death_NN ._.
These_DT figures_NNS apply_VBP to_TO both_DT surgical_JJ wards_NNS ;_: but_CC in_IN both_DT antiseptic_JJ practice_NN was_VBD more_RBR strictly_RB pursued_VBN in_IN 1882_CD ._.

15_CD ._.

16_CD ._.

17_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Medical_NNP college_NN hospital_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, there_EX was_VBD in_IN 1882_CD a_DT great_JJ reduction_NN in_IN the_DT quantity_NN of_IN those_DT affections_NNS known_VBN as_IN hospitalism_NN ._.

Surgical_JJ mortality_NN ,_, generally_RB low_JJ in_IN the_DT wards_NNS ,_, indicates_VBZ some_DT general_JJ and_CC favourable_JJ influence_NN ._.
This_DT may_MD still_RB be_VB the_DT influence_NN of_IN Listerism_NNP ,_, for_IN its_PRP$ use_NN is_VBZ general_JJ and_CC the_DT system_NN includes_VBZ much_RB that_DT is_VBZ good_JJ besides_IN its_PRP$ pecu-_JJ liar_JJ dressings_NNS ._.

26_CD ._.

27_CD ._.

A_DT sum_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.

28_CD ._.
The_DT establishment_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT subject_NN of_IN much_JJ con-_JJ sideration_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN based_VBN hitherto_NN on_IN a_DT scheme_NN laid_VBN down_RB by_IN Dr._NNP Charles_NNP ,_, which_WDT provided_VBD that_IN the_DT nursing_NN should_MD be_VB done_VBN by_IN the_DT class_NN of_IN civil_JJ and_CC military_JJ pupil_NN midwives_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT head_NN and_CC a_DT second_JJ midwife_NN or_CC matron_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD some_DT mistakes_NNS of_IN system_NN at_IN the_DT outset_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT nursing_NN was_VBD not_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
An_DT attempt_NN was_VBD made_VBN ,_, with_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, to_TO rectify_VB this_DT ,_, by_IN placing_VBG all_PDT the_DT nurses_NNS under_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT resident_JJ sister_NN who_WP took_VBD up_RP her_PRP$ quarters_NNS in_IN the_DT building_NN ,_, and_CC re-adjusting_VBG the_DT establishment_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT basis_NN of_IN pupil_NN nursing_NN was_VBD retained_VBN ._.

A_DT scheme_NN framed_VBN with_IN this_DT object_NN is_VBZ in_IN course_NN of_IN preparation_NN for_IN submission_NN to_TO Government_NNP ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB considered_VBN satisfactory_JJ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, that_IN the_DT Eden_NNP hospital_NN ,_, with_IN imperfect_JJ nursing_NN and_CC other_JJ disadvantages_NNS inseparable_JJ from_IN a_DT commencement_NN ,_, should_MD have_VB already_RB given_VBN evidence_NN of_IN having_VBG met_VBN a_DT public_JJ want_NN ._.
29_CD ._.

26,293_CD ,_, against_IN Rs.25,787_NNP in_IN 1881_CD ._.

223_CD in_IN excess_NN of_IN the_DT expenditure_NN in_IN 1881_CD ,_, and_CC some_DT alterations_NNS were_VBD made_VBN in_IN the_DT varieties_NNS of_IN diets_NNS ._.

2_CD ._.
The_DT following_VBG table_JJ shews_NNS the_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS treated_VBN in_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP hospitals_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN :_: (_( 3_CD )_) The_DT three_CD hospitals_NNS which_WDT treat_VBP out-door_JJ patients_NNS (_( 4_CD )_) of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT events_NNS of_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN have_VBP finally_RB set_VBN at_IN rest_VB the_DT contro-_JJ versy_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT fitness_NN of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP for_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN surgical_JJ disease_NN ._.
The_DT surgeons_NNS of_IN both_DT wards_NNS continued_VBD to_TO use_VB the_DT systems_NNS employed_VBN by_IN them_PRP in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
Dr._NNP MacLeod_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT first_JJ ward_NN ,_, carried_VBD out_IN the_DT Listerian_JJ method_NN in_IN its_PRP$ entirety_NN ;_: while_IN Dr._NNP Raye_NNP confined_VBD this_DT method_NN to_TO severe_JJ cases_NNS ,_, using_VBG less_JJR elaborate_JJ dressings_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ less_NN important_JJ cases_NNS 7_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT two_CD wards_NNS together_RB ,_, there_EX were_VBD ,_, apart_RB from_IN ophthalmic_JJ cases_NNS ,_, 279_CD important_JJ surgical_JJ operations_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD followed_VBN by_IN death_NN in_IN 29_CD instances_NNS ._.
In_IN 1881_CD there_EX had_VBD been_VBN 252_CD operations_NNS with_IN 54_CD deaths_NNS ._.
There_EX was_VBD thus_RB a_DT very_RB marked_JJ improvement_NN in_IN the_DT degree_NN of_IN mortality_NN after_IN operative_JJ surgery_NN in_IN all_DT cases_NNS taken_VBN together_RB ,_, and_CC this_DT is_VBZ stated_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN accompanied_VBN by_IN increased_JJ strictness_NN in_IN the_DT application_NN of_IN antiseptic_JJ dressings_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, it_PRP does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB that_IN there_EX was_VBD any_DT improvement_NN on_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN in_IN cases_NNS of_IN exceptional_JJ severity_NN which_WDT were_VBD employed_VBN as_IN ``_`` tests_NNS ._. ''_''
In_IN 1882_CD there_EX were_VBD 16_CD operations_NNS for_IN excision_NN of_IN bones_NNS and_CC joints_NNS ,_, with_IN 3_CD deaths_NNS ._.
In_IN 1881_CD there_EX had_VBD been_VBN 11_CD such_JJ operations_NNS with_IN one_CD death_NN ._.
In_IN 1882_CD there_EX were_VBD 24_CD major_JJ amputations_NNS with_IN 8_CD deaths_NNS ._.
In_IN 1881_CD there_EX had_VBD been_VBN 17_CD with_IN 6_CD deaths_NNS The_DT Surgeon.General_NNP points_NNS out_RP that_IN in_IN both_DT years_NNS Listerism_NNP was_VBD most_JJS strictly_RB used_VBN in_IN this_DT class_NN of_IN cases_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT fluctuations_NNS are_VBP probably_RB due_JJ to_TO other_JJ causes_NNS ._.

Particular_JJ diseases.CALCUTTA_NN MEDICAL_NNP INSTITUTIONS_NNP ._.
7_CD and_CC their_PRP$ consequences_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ sufficient_JJ to_TO say_VB here_RB that_IN they_PRP are_VBP entirely_RB satisfactory_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN nothing_NN occurred_VBD during_IN the_DT year_NN which_WDT could_MD suggest_VB a_DT thought_NN of_IN preventable_JJ mortality_NN ._.
Dr._NNP McLeod_NNP ,_, the_DT first_JJ surgeon_NN ,_, thinks_VBZ that_IN a_DT misapprehension_NN has_VBZ arisen_VBN as_IN to_TO the_DT teaching_NN ,_, by_IN him_PRP ,_, of_IN a_DT system_NN which_WDT his_PRP$ pupils_NNS will_MD find_VB impracticable_JJ in_IN private_JJ life_NN ._.
He_PRP now_RB writes_VBZ :_: ``_`` What_WP I_PRP do_VBP teach_VB and_CC practice_NN is_VBZ not_RB the_DT Listerian_JJ method_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT Listerian_JJ principle_NN of_IN asepsis_NN and_CC its_PRP$ advantages_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB in_IN one_CD single_JJ case_NN ,_, since_IN I_PRP became_VBD First_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, carried_VBD out_IN the_DT Listerian_JJ method_NN in_IN all_DT its_PRP$ details_NNS *_VBP *_IN it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB in_IN large_JJ and_CC delicate_JJ operations_NNS that_IN I_PRP resort_VBP to_TO some_DT of_IN the_DT more_RBR complicated_JJ Listerian_JJ materials_NNS and_CC methods_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP found_VBN that_IN students_NNS are_VBP able_JJ intelligently_RB and_CC effectively_RB to_TO follow_VB even_RB the_DT more_RBR complicated_JJ plans_NNS of_IN dressing_VBG in_IN private_JJ practice_NN ;_: and_CC as_IN regards_NNS the_DT simpler_NN ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB conceive_VB anything_NN less_RBR difficult_JJ or_CC expensive_JJ ,_, except_IN the_DT open_JJ system_NN which_WDT I_PRP also_RB teach_VBP and_CC illustrate_VBP ,_, than_IN that_DT which_WDT I_PRP employ_VBP in_IN most_JJS cases_NNS ._.
I_PRP trust_VBP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT surgeon-general_JJ and_CC Government_NNP will_MD be_VB pleased_VBN to_TO cancel_VB the_DT censure_NN which_WDT the_DT sentences_NNS which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP quoted_VBN might_MD be_VB understood_VBN to_TO imply_VB ._. ''_''
The_DT reference_NN here_RB is_VBZ to_TO the_DT words_NNS of_IN the_DT resolution_NN on_IN the_DT report_NN for_IN 1882_CD ,_, paragraph_VBZ 6_CD :_: ``_`` Dr._NNP McLeod_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT first_JJ ward_NN ,_, carried_VBD out_IN the_DT Listerian_JJ method_NN in_IN its_PRP$ entirety_NN ;_: ''_'' and_CC paragraph_VBD 7_CD :_: ``_`` The_DT advantage_NN of_IN strict_JJ Listerism_NNP seems_VBZ doubtful_JJ in_IN hospital_JJ practice_NN ;_: while_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT system_NN to_TO be_VB taught_VBN exclusively_RB to_TO pupils_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB desirable_JJ ._. It_PRP will_MD be_VB observed_VBN that_IN 206_CD persons_NNS died_VBD from_IN phthisis_NN ,_, and_CC 179_CD from_IN ``_`` respiratory_JJ affections_NNS ''_'' during_IN the_DT year_NN 1884_CD ._.
The_DT frequency_NN of_IN chest_NN maladies_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT heavy_JJ mortality_NN they_PRP yield_VBP ,_, call_NN for_IN remark_NN ._.
The_DT exciting_JJ causes_NNS of_IN pulmonary_JJ diseases_NNS are_VBP obscure_JJ ._.
We_PRP notice_VBP epide-_JJ mic_JJ occurrence_NN of_IN pneumonia_NN ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, in_IN our_PRP$ cold_JJ damp_NN weather_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN other_JJ times_NNS under_IN conditions_NNS precisely_RB the_DT reverse_NN ._.
The_DT disease_NN is_VBZ met_VBN with_IN in_IN our_PRP$ hospitals_NNS in_IN both_DT medical_JJ and_CC surgical_JJ practice_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN a_DT complication_NN in_IN the_DT reduced_JJ and_CC exhausted_VBD ._.
The_DT physical_JJ surroundings_NNS of_IN many_JJ fatal_JJ cases_NNS outside_IN our_PRP$ institutions_NNS lead_VBP to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN a_DT vitiated_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT air_NN breathed_VBD is_VBZ one_CD ,_, if_IN not_RB the_DT principal_NN ,_, factor_NN in_IN the_DT causation_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, rather_RB than_IN ,_, as_IN is_VBZ too_RB often_RB supposed_VBN ,_, mere_JJ changes_NNS in_IN the_DT temperature_NN or_CC humidity_NN of_IN the_DT atmosphere_NN ._.
The_DT disorder_NN is_VBZ so_RB frequently_RB a_DT concomitant_NN during_IN the_DT progress_NN of_IN some_DT diseases_NNS ,_, that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB unreasonable_JJ to_TO believe_VB the_DT productive_JJ sources_NNS are_VBP alike_RB ._.
The_DT deaths_NNS from_IN pneumonia_NN are_VBP not_RB shewn_JJ separately_RB in_IN this_DT statement_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ presumed_VBN they_PRP are_VBP included_VBN under_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN ``_`` Respiratory_JJ affections_NNS ._. ''_''
The_DT following_JJ very_RB meagre_JJ information_NN is_VBZ all_DT I_PRP can_MD cull_VB from_IN the_DT several_JJ annual_JJ reports_NNS ._.
In_IN 1884_CD pneumonia_NN caused_VBD 3_CD deaths_NNS in_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP ;_: the_DT admissions_NNS are_VBP not_RB given_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT General_NNP Hospital_NNP there_EX was_VBD 1_CD fatal_JJ case_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS is_VBZ not_RB recorded_VBN ._.

The_DT ratio_NN of_IN admissions_NNS to_TO total_JJ strength_NN per_IN 1,000_CD was_VBD 735_CD in_IN 1884_CD against_IN 796_CD and_CC 853_CD in_IN the_DT two_CD preceding_VBG years_NNS ._.
The_DT daily_JJ average_JJ number_NN of_IN sick_NN in_IN 1884_CD was_VBD 82_CD against_IN 85_CD and_CC 83_CD in_IN 1883_CD and_CC 1882_CD ,_, respectively_RB ,_, thus_RB shewing_VBG a_DT decrease_NN of_IN 3_CD during_IN the_DT year_NN as_IN com-_NN pared_VBN with_IN 1883_CD ._.
The_DT prevailing_NN diseases_VBZ during_IN the_DT year_NN were_VBD ague_JJ ,_, dysen-_JJ tery_NN ,_, and_CC venereal_JJ affections_NNS ._.
There_EX were_VBD 110_CD cases_NNS of_IN venereal_JJ disease_NN admitted_VBN against_IN 99_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD only_RB 2_CD cases_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN among_IN the_DT native_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT police_NN force_NN ._.
Of_IN these_DT one_CD case_NN was_VBD of_IN the_DT discrete_NN and_CC the_DT other_JJ of_IN the_DT modified_JJ variety_NN ._.
The_DT disease_NN occurred_VBD during_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN February_NNP ._.
All_PDT the_DT unprotected_JJ constables_NNS of_IN the_DT police_NN were_VBD vaccinated_VBN during_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN November_NNP and_CC December_NNP by_IN the_DT officers_NNS of_IN the_DT Vaccine_NNP Department_NNP ._.
112_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD 10_CD cases_NNS of_IN cholera_NN admitted_VBN into_IN hospital_NN against_IN 18_CD in_IN 1883_CD ._.
Of_IN these_DT 10_CD patients_NNS ,_, 4_CD ,_, or_CC 40_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, died_VBD ,_, while_IN during_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN 50_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
succumbed_NN ._.
113_CD ._.

in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
114_CD ._.
The_DT hospital_NN buildings_NNS and_CC its_PRP$ conservancy_NN arrangements_NNS were_VBD in_IN the_DT same_JJ good_JJ order_NN throughout_IN the_DT year_NN as_IN reported_VBN before_IN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ reported_VBN that_IN ``_`` a_DT new_JJ pucca_NN dead-house_NN was_VBD erected_VBN in_IN the_DT compound_NN ,_, to_TO replace_VB the_DT old_JJ wooden_JJ dead-cart_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD become_VBN rotten_JJ and_CC useless_JJ ._. ''_''
A_DT new_JJ pucca_NN godown_NN was_VBD also_RB built_VBN to_TO contain_VB the_DT hospital_NN clothing_NN and_CC bedding_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT old_JJ clothes_NNS godown_NN was_VBD converted_VBN into_IN a_DT guard-room_NN for_IN the_DT native_JJ officer_NN and_CC the_DT police_NN guards_NNS attached_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.

115_CD ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT special_JJ hospital_NN for_IN the_DT European_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT force_NN ._.

22_CD REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP 116_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN January_NNP and_CC February_NNP ,_, and_CC up_RB to_TO the_DT middle_NN of_IN March_NNP 1884_CD ,_, there_EX were_VBD 210_CD constables_NNS of_IN the_DT Bengal_NNP Police_NNP attached_VBD to_TO the_DT Calcutta_NNP Reserve_NNP Force_NNP for_IN duty_NN at_IN the_DT International_NNP Exhibition_NNP ._.

READ_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) There_EX was_VBD a_DT considerable_JJ increase_NN both_DT in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN cholera_NN and_CC small-pox_JJ cases_NNS treated_VBN in_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, the_DT number_NN under_IN each_DT of_IN these_DT heads_NNS being_VBG 1,023_CD and_CC 275_CD against_IN 932_CD and_CC 111_CD respectively_RB in_IN the_DT year_NN 1883_CD ._.
The_DT death-rate_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, under_IN both_DT heads_NNS was_VBD lower_JJR than_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, being_VBG 523_CD and_CC 312_CD per_IN mille_NN against_IN 547_CD and_CC 315_CD per_IN mille_NN respectively_RB ._.

2_CD ._.
The_DT following_VBG table_NN shows_VBZ the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS treated_VBN ,_, both_DT as_IN in-door_JJ and_CC out-door_JJ patients_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT several_JJ hospitals_NNS in_IN Calcutta_NNP during_IN the_DT past_JJ two_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS which_WDT occurred_VBD among_IN those_DT under_IN treatment_NN :_: (_( 3_CD )_) 5_CD ._.
The_DT mortuary_JJ statistics_NNS of_IN Calcutta_NNP for_IN 1884_CD show_NN the_DT year_NN to_TO have_VB been_VBN unusually_RB unhealthy_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, surprising_VBG to_TO learn_VB that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN sick_JJ in_IN hospital_NN rose_VBD from_IN 19,872_CD to_TO 20,833_CD ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT death-rate_NN among_IN them_PRP was_VBD 127_CD against_IN 116_CD in_IN 1883_CD ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT particular_JJ diseases_NNS treated_VBN at_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, the_DT Inspector-General_JJ makes_VBZ the_DT following_JJ remarks_NNS :_: (_( 4_CD )_) At_IN the_DT Mayo_NNP Hospital_NNP 229_CD major_JJ and_CC 12,783_CD minor_JJ operations_NNS were_VBD per-_JJ formed_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.

8_CD ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ observes_NNS with_IN satisfaction_NN the_DT growing_VBG use-_JJ fulness_NN of_IN the_DT Eden_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ attached_VBN to_TO the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.

25,499_CD against_IN Rs_NNP ._.
24,639_CD in_IN 1883_CD ._.
The_DT increase_NN was_VBD chiefly_JJ due_JJ to_TO a_DT larger_JJR amount_NN being_VBG spent_VBN on_IN ``_`` buildings_NNS and_CC repairs_NNS ._. ''_''
There_EX was_VBD an_DT increase_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.

The_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT diet_NN was_VBD 8_CD annas_NNS and_CC 3_CD pies_NNS in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Europeans_NNPS ,_, and_CC 2_CD annas_NNS and_CC 3_CD pies_NNS in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN natives_NNS ._.

2_CD ._.
The_DT report_NN is_VBZ late_RB in_IN its_PRP$ submission_NN ._.
The_DT delay_NN has_VBZ been_VBN unavoidable_JJ ._.
No_DT unnecessary_JJ time_NN has_VBZ been_VBN wasted_VBN in_IN its_PRP$ preparation_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP still_RB sanguine_VBP that_IN the_DT Hon'ble_NNP the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP will_MD deem_VB it_PRP right_RB to_TO reconsider_VB my_PRP$ earnest_JJS appeals_NNS and_CC sanction_NN the_DT strengthening_NN of_IN my_PRP$ establishment_NN ,_, that_IN my_PRP$ office_NN may_MD be_VB placed_VBN on_IN a_DT footing_JJ consistent_NN with_IN the_DT work_NN to_TO be_VB done_VBN ,_, and_CC thus_RB enable_VB me_PRP to_TO fulfil_VB my_PRP$ functions_NNS as_IN administrative_JJ head_NN of_IN the_DT Provincial_NNP Medical_NNP Service_NNP ,_, with_IN despatch_NN and_CC ._.

most_JJS unsanitary_JJ wards_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC suburbs_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN many_JJ die_NN of_IN foul_JJ air_NN and_CC defective_JJ diet_NN ,_, goes_VBZ without_IN the_DT saying_NN ,_, Eliminating_NNP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, the_DT excess_JJ mortality_NN from_IN these_DT causes_NNS ,_, which_WDT will_MD possibly_RB be_VB found_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN of_IN exceptional_JJ occurrence_NN ,_, the_DT general_JJ health_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS who_WP reside_VBP in_IN those_DT portions_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN to_TO which_WDT sanitary_JJ improvements_NNS have_VBP been_VBN extended_VBN was_VBD fairly_RB good_JJ throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ._.

MUNICIPAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ._.
MEDICAL_NNP ._.
DARJEELING_NN ,_, THE_DT 30TH_CD OCTOBER_NNP 1886_CD ._.
RESOLUTION_NNP ._.
READ_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) and_CC if_IN this_DT is_VBZ correct_JJ ,_, the_DT crowding_NN should_MD be_VB temporary_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT necessity_NN for_IN the_DT ward_NN should_MD shortly_RB cease_VB ._.
This_DT hospital_NN still_RB holds_VBZ a_DT number_NN of_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN blindness_NN ,_, and_CC others_NNS who_WP should_MD be_VB classed_VBN as_IN incurables_NNS ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP should_MD renew_VB his_PRP$ efforts_NNS to_TO transfer_VB such_JJ persons_NNS to_TO the_DT charge_NN of_IN their_PRP$ friends_NNS and_CC relative_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN in-patients_NNS treated_VBN in_IN the_DT voluntary_JJ lock-hospitals_NNS during_IN 1885_CD was_VBD 414_CD against_IN 333_CD in_IN 1884_CD ,_, showing_VBG an_DT increase_NN of_IN 81_CD ._.
The_DT daily_JJ average_JJ number_NN of_IN patients_NNS treated_VBN was_VBD 90_CD against_IN 61_CD in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
This_DT shows_VBZ that_IN each_DT patient_NN on_IN the_DT average_JJ continued_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN 79_CD days_NNS in_IN 1885_CD and_CC 68_CD days_NNS in_IN 1884_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN in-door_JJ cases_NNS ,_, 48_CD were_VBD Europeans_NNPS and_CC Eurasians_NNPS and_CC 366_CD natives_NNS ._.
Ninety-three_JJ patients_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, 48_CD Europeans_NNPS and_CC Eurasians_NNPS and_CC 45_CD natives_NNS ,_, were_VBD treated_VBN in_IN the_DT Sealdah_NNP Lock-_NNP hospital_NN ,_, against_IN 111_CD ,_, or_CC 38_CD Europeans_NNPS and_CC 73_CD natives_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
Three_CD hundred_CD and_CC twenty-one_JJ patients_NNS (_( natives_NNS )_) were_VBD treated_VBN in_IN the_DT Alipore_NNP lock-hospital_JJ ,_, against_IN 222_CD in_IN 1884_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS was_VBD 342_CD ,_, of_IN which_WDT 100_CD were_VBD received_VBN on_IN transfer_NN from_IN the_DT Campbell_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
The_DT corresponding_JJ numbers_NNS in_IN 1884_CD were_VBD 279_CD and_CC 75_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD 18_CD deaths_NNS among_IN the_DT native_JJ in-door_JJ patients_NNS ,_, or_CC a_DT rate_NN of_IN 4.9_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
on_IN total_JJ cases_NNS treated_VBD ,_, against_IN 21_CD and_CC 6.3_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD treated_VBN in_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS 1,889_CD out-door_JJ patients_NNS against_IN 1,454_CD in_IN 1884_CD ,_, the_DT daily_JJ average_JJ number_NN being_VBG 6.5_CD and_CC 5.9_CD respectively_RB ._.
Of_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN out-door_JJ cases_NNS ,_, 39_CD were_VBD treated_VBN in_IN the_DT Sealdah_NNP Lock-hospitals_NNP ,_, against_IN 50_CD in_IN 1884_CD ._.
Altogether_RB 1,850_CD patients_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN in_IN the_DT Alipore_NNP Lock-hospitals_NNS ,_, against_IN 1,404_CD in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ._.
Many_JJ cases_NNS of_IN venereal_JJ disease_NN are_VBP still_RB treated_VBN at_IN the_DT other_JJ hospitals_NNS to_TO the_DT detriment_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS of_IN other_JJ classes_NNS for_IN whom_WP those_DT institu-_JJ tions_NNS are_VBP chiefly_RB intended_VBN ._.
The_DT Inspector-General_NNP will_MD be_VB requested_VBN to_TO instruct_VB the_DT Principal_NNP of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP and_CC Superintendents_NNP of_IN other_JJ hospitals_NNS to_TO transfer_VB as_IN many_JJ patients_NNS as_IN they_PRP can_MD to_TO the_DT voluntary_JJ hospitals_NNS ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT results_NNS of_IN the_DT surgical_JJ operations_NNS in_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP were_VBD more_RBR satisfactory_JJ than_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD 394_CD ,_, of_IN which_WDT 30_CD cases_NNS proved_VBD fatal_JJ ,_, against_IN 416_CD operations_NNS with_IN 52_CD deaths_NNS in_IN 1884_CD ._.
Ophthalmic_JJ operations_NNS are_VBP not_RB included_VBN in_IN these_DT figures_NNS ._.
There_EX were_VBD three_CD deaths_NNS from_IN erysipelas_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT disease_NN broke_VBD out_RP in_IN November_NNP ,_, having_VBG been_VBN imported_VBN by_IN the_DT husband_NN of_IN a_DT patient_NN ,_, and_CC spread_NN by_IN infection_NN ._.
Six_CD cases_NNS in_IN all_DT occurred_VBD ,_, of_IN which_WDT three_CD were_VBD fatal_JJ ._.
Prompt_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO segregate_VB the_DT sufferers_NNS and_CC to_TO disinfect_VB the_DT wards_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT outbreak_NN occurred_VBD ,_, and_CC to_TO purify_VB the_DT bedding_NN ,_, instruments_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ appliances_NNS through_IN which_WDT contagion_NN might_MD be_VB communicated_VBN ._.
Dr._NNP Cowie_NNP considers_VBZ that_IN the_DT history_NN of_IN this_DT small_JJ outbreak_NN shows_NNS that_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN erysipelas_NNS ,_, once_RB the_DT most_RBS dreaded_JJ and_CC fatal_JJ of_IN all_DT forms_NNS of_IN hospitalism_NN ,_, is_VBZ now_RB completely_RB under_IN control_NN ,_, while_IN its_PRP$ specific_JJ action_NN can_MD readily_RB be_VB destroyed_VBN or_CC rendered_VBN harmless_NN by_IN antiseptic_JJ surgery_NN and_CC effective_JJ sanitary_JJ measures_NNS ._.
He_PRP has_VBZ pointed_VBN out_RP ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT College_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, unlike_IN most_JJS modern_JJ hospitals_NNS which_WDT are_VBP built_VBN on_IN some_DT principle_NN of_IN segmentation_NN ,_, is_VBZ en_JJ bloc_NN ,_, and_CC that_DT at_IN present_JJ scarcely_RB any_DT means_NNS exist_VBP for_IN segre-_JJ gating_VBG infectious_JJ cases_NNS ._.
This_DT matter_NN has_VBZ already_RB received_VBN the_DT attention_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Inspector-General_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN asked_VBN to_TO submit_VB plans_NNS and_CC estimates_NNS for_IN a_DT suitable_JJ ward_NN for_IN cases_NNS of_IN this_DT character_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Eden_NNP Hospital_NNP 1,575_CD women_NNS and_CC children_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN against_IN 1,390_CD in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
Of_IN these_DT ,_, 1,064_CD were_VBD Europeans_NNPS and_CC 511_CD natives_NNS ._.
The_DT deaths_NNS among_IN the_DT former_JJ amounted_VBD to_TO 35_CD ,_, and_CC among_IN the_DT latter_JJ 32_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN confinement_JJ cases_NNS rose_VBD from_IN 379_CD to_TO 432_CD ,_, the_DT mortality_NN among_IN this_DT class_NN of_IN cases_NNS being_VBG 22_CD against_IN 29_CD in_IN 1884_CD ._.
The_DT reduction_NN in_IN the_DT death-rate_NN is_VBZ satis-_JJ factory_NN ,_, as_IN many_JJ patients_NNS were_VBD admitted_VBN in_IN a_DT hopeless_JJ state_NN ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-_NNP Governor_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ with_IN the_DT general_JJ working_NN of_IN the_DT hospital_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN a_DT steam_NN laundry_NN is_VBZ required_VBN ,_, as_IN the_DT present_JJ arrangements_NNS are_VBP defective_JJ ._.
An_DT estimate_NN has_VBZ been_VBN called_VBN for_IN ;_: but_CC the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ fears_NNS that_IN with_IN so_RB many_JJ urgent_JJ calls_NNS upon_IN the_DT Provincial_NNP finances_NNS ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB difficult_JJ to_TO provide_VB the_DT necessary_JJ funds_NNS at_IN present_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN enteric_JJ and_CC remittent_JJ fever_NN treated_VBN in_IN all_PDT the_DT hospitals_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN was_VBD 20_CD and_CC 803_CD respectively_RB ,_, against_IN 11_CD and_CC 930_CD ,_, the_DT corresponding_JJ figures_NNS of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT 20_CD cases_NNS of_IN enteric_JJ (_( or_CC typhoid_NN )_) fever_NN ,_, 17_CD are_VBP shown_VBN as_IN having_VBG been_VBN admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP (_( 3_CD )_) General_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, 1_CD into_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC 2_CD into_IN the_DT Police_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
These_DT figures_NNS are_VBP ,_, however_RB ,_, said_VBD to_TO be_VB unreliable_JJ owing_VBG to_TO the_DT diffi-_JJ culty_NN of_IN distinguishing_VBG between_IN enteric_JJ and_CC remittent_JJ fever_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, as_IN Dr._NNP Cleghorn_NNP ,_, the_DT Officiating_NNP Surgeon_NNP Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP General_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, remarks_NNS ,_, ``_`` is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT imperfect_NN knowledge_NN which_WDT we_PRP at_IN present_JJ possess_NN of_IN the_DT fevers_NNS of_IN this_DT country_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO a_DT general_JJ belief_NN in_IN the_DT widespread_JJ influence_NN and_CC prevalence_NN of_IN malaria_NN ._. ''_''
In_IN order_NN to_TO overcome_VB this_DT difficulty_NN ,_, the_DT Inspector-General_JJ strongly_NN urges_VBZ upon_IN all_DT medical_JJ officers_NNS the_DT importance_NN of_IN a_DT post-mortem_JJ examination_NN in_IN every_DT case_NN of_IN death_NN from_IN remittent_NN or_CC suspected_VBN typhoid_JJ fever_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT nursing_NN arrangements_NNS at_IN the_DT General_NNP and_CC Medical_NNP College_NNP Hos-_NNP pitals_NNS continue_VBP to_TO be_VB managed_VBN by_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP Hospital_NNP Nurses_NNP '_POS Institution_NNP ,_, under_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN the_DT ladies_NNS of_IN the_DT Clewer_NNP Sisterhood_NNP ._.
Drs_NNP ._.
Cowie_NNP ,_, Coates_NNP ,_, Harvey_NNP ,_, and_CC Cleghorn_NNP all_DT speak_NN in_IN the_DT highest_JJS terms_NNS of_IN the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN ;_: and_CC the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ desires_NNS to_TO add_VB his_PRP$ testimony_NN to_TO the_DT valuable_JJ services_NNS which_WDT the_DT institution_NN has_VBZ rendered_VBN to_TO the_DT cause_NN of_IN medical_JJ charity_NN in_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
9_CD ._.

5,54,300_CD ._.

4,23,236_CD ,_, which_WDT exceeded_VBD the_DT amount_NN expended_VBD in_IN 1884_CD by_IN Rs_NNP ._.

FROM_IN A._NNP J._NNP COWIE_NNP ,_, ESQ._NNP ,_, Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Civil_NNP Hospitals_NNP ,_, Bengal_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_NNP SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP THE_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP OF_NNP BENGAL_NNP ,_, MEDICAL_NNP AND_NNP MUNICIPAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ._.
Dated_VBN Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT 29th_CD July_NNP 1887_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO submit_VB the_DT following_JJ report_NN on_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Institutions_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1886_CD ._.
2_CD ._.
I_PRP append_VBP the_DT usual_JJ return_NN exhibiting_VBG the_DT condition_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN itself_PRP ,_, in_IN respect_NN of_IN the_DT deaths_NNS from_IN the_DT most_RBS prevalent_JJ diseases_NNS ,_, as_IN shown_VBN in_IN the_DT mortuary_JJ returns_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
Deaths_NNS from_IN the_DT most_RBS prevalent_JJ Diseases_NNS in_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
Cholera_NN ._.
Diarrh2_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP confirm_NN these_DT views_NNS ._.
The_DT largest_JJS hospital_NN mortality_NN from_IN cholera_NN occurred_VBN in_IN the_DT Campbell_NNP :_: the_DT Mayo_NNP gives_VBZ the_DT next_JJ largest_JJS number_NN of_IN deaths3_JJ CALCUTTA_NNP MEDICAL_NNP INSTITUTIONS_NNP ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT daily_JJ average_JJ number_NN of_IN patients_NNS under_IN treatment_NN in_IN 1886_CD was_VBD as_IN follows:4_JJ REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP 444_CD Europeans_NNPS ,_, 543_CD Eurasians_NNPS ,_, 324_CD Mahomedans_NNPS ,_, and_CC 429_CD ``_`` other_JJ races_NNS ,_, ''_'' and_CC a_DT decrease_NN of_IN 906_CD Hindus_NNP ._.

FROM_IN A._NNP HILSON_NNP ,_, ESQ._NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Civil_NNP Hospitals_NNP ,_, Bengal_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_VB CHIEF_NNP SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP THE_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP OF_NNP BENGAL_NNP ._.
Dated_VBN Darjeeling_NNP ,_, the_DT 12th_CD July_NNP 1889_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, IN_NNP submitting_VBG the_DT annual_JJ report_NN of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Institutions_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP for_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO state_NN that_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN written_VBN under_IN considerable_JJ disadvantages_NNS ,_, because_IN having_VBG been_VBN employed_VBN in_IN another_DT part_NN of_IN India_NNP for_IN some_DT months_NNS past_IN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP not_RB had_VBN an_DT opportunity_NN of_IN making_VBG myself_PRP acquainted_VBN ,_, by_IN personal_JJ inspection_NN ,_, with_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT occurrences_NNS which_WDT have_VBP recently_RB taken_VBN place_NN in_IN them_PRP ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT mortality_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC suburbs_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, and_CC also_RB of_IN Howrah_NNP ,_, is_VBZ given_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ table_NN ,_, from_IN which_WDT it_PRP may_MD be_VB inferred_VBN that_IN the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ population_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN so_RB good_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
In_IN most_JJS of_IN these_DT localities_NNS the_DT death-rate_NN has_VBZ increased_VBN ,_, chiefly_NN from_IN the_DT greater_JJR prevalence_NN of_IN cholera_NN and_CC of_IN those_DT diseases_NNS classified_VBN under_IN the_DT heading_NN of_IN ``_`` other_JJ causes_NNS ,_, ''_'' while_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN fevers_NNS ,_, bowel-complaints_NNS and_CC small-pox_NN has_VBZ varied_VBN little_JJ from_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year:2_JJ REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP 3_CD ._.
This_DT greater_JJR unhealthiness_NN was_VBD not_RB accompanied_VBN by_IN any_DT increased_JJ number_NN of_IN patients_NNS treated_VBN in_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, but_CC with_IN a_DT very_RB considerable_JJ diminution_NN ._.
The_DT following_JJ statement_NN shows_VBZ the_DT numbers_NNS treated_VBN in_IN the_DT Medical_JJ Institutions_NNS :_: CALCUTTA_NNP MEDICAL_NNP INSTITUTIONS_NNP ._.
3_CD 7_CD ._.
This_DT table_NN is_VBZ interesting_JJ ,_, inasmuch_JJ as_IN it_PRP shows_VBZ that_IN a_DT much_RB larger_JJR number_NN of_IN Europeans_NNPS resorted_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
An-_NNP other_JJ feature_NN of_IN the_DT table_NN is_VBZ the_DT diminution_NN in_IN the_DT numbers_NNS of_IN Hindu_NNP and_CC Mahomedan_NNP women_NNS and_CC children_NNS ,_, and_CC probably_RB this_DT may_MD be_VB due_JJ to_TO the_DT successful_JJ working_NN of_IN the_DT out-door_JJ department_NN of_IN the_DT Dufferin_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.

2_CD REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP 4_CD ._.

5_CD ._.

3_CD 11_CD ._.

12_CD ._.

46_CD ._.

Only_RB 31,338_CD women_NNS and_CC 51,439_CD children_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN in_IN the_DT various_JJ institutions_NNS to_TO which_WDT the_DT report_NN refers_NNS in_IN 1889_CD as_IN compared_VBN with_IN 36,030_CD women_NNS and_CC 59,404_CD children_NNS in_IN 1888_CD ._.
