The_DT death-rate_NN in_IN all_DT Hospitals_NNS ,_, excluding_VBG the_DT Eye_NNP Infirmary_NNP ,_, rose_VBD from_IN 124_CD to_TO 126_CD ,_, the_DT rates_NNS for_IN the_DT Campbell_NNP and_CC Howrah_NNP Hospitals_NNP ,_, where_WRB paupers_NNS are_VBP treated_VBN ,_, and_CC into_IN which_WDT many_JJ moribund_NN and_CC incurable_JJ cases_NNS are_VBP admitted_VBN ,_, being_VBG ,_, as_IN usual_JJ ,_, very_RB high_JJ ._.
Though_IN the_DT general_JJ death-rate_NN is_VBZ slightly_RB higher_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ,_, which_WDT again_RB showed_VBD a_DT slight_JJ increase_NN on_IN the_DT years_NNS 1887_CD and_CC 1888_CD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD still_RB much_JJ below_IN the_DT average_NN of_IN the_DT years_NNS 1879_CD (_( 3_CD )_) 8_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Eden_NNP Hospital_NNP 2,435_CD women_NNS and_CC children_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN against_IN 2,668_CD in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, showing_VBG a_DT decrease_NN of_IN 233_CD cases_NNS ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO want_VB of_IN accommodation_NN when_WRB the_DT building_NN was_VBD under_IN repairs_NNS ,_, many_JJ applicants_NNS had_VBD to_TO be_VB refused_VBN admission_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT 2,435_CD patients_NNS treated_VBD ,_, 832_CD were_VBD Europeans_NNPS and_CC 1,603_CD natives_NNS ._.
The_DT deaths_NNS among_IN the_DT former_JJ amounted_VBD to_TO 29_CD ,_, and_CC among_IN the_DT latter_NN to_TO 56_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN confinement_JJ cases_NNS fell_VBD from_IN 513_CD in_IN 1888_CD to_TO 497_CD ;_: the_DT mortality_NN among_IN this_DT class_NN of_IN patients_NNS being_VBG 18_CD against_IN 20_CD in_IN 1888_CD ._.
The_DT very_RB few_JJ cases_NNS of_IN septicÃ¦mia_NN which_WDT occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP show_NN that_IN antiseptic_JJ precautions_NNS were_VBD carefully_RB enforced_VBN in_IN all_DT cases_NNS of_IN labour_NN ._.
The_DT import-_JJ ance_NN of_IN these_DT precautions_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN fully_RB impressed_VBN on_IN the_DT nurses_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ hoped_VBN that_IN no_DT pains_NNS will_MD be_VB spared_VBN to_TO eliminate_VB this_DT dangerous_JJ and_CC fatal_JJ disease_NN ._.
The_DT steam_NN laundry_NN sanctioned_VBD for_IN this_DT institution_NN is_VBZ not_RB yet_RB ready_JJ for_IN use_NN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO some_DT delay_NN in_IN fitting_VBG it_PRP with_IN the_DT requisite_JJ machinery_NN ._.
Certain_NN alterations_NNS made_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Joubert_NNP in_IN the_DT classification_NN of_IN obstetric_JJ and_CC gynÃ¦cological_JJ operations_NNS ,_, are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO produce_VB some_DT confusion_NN in_IN the_DT annual_JJ returns_NNS ,_, but_CC appear_VBP ,_, at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB unavoidable_JJ ,_, as_IN ,_, in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN any_DT recent_JJ orders_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN ,_, difficulty_NN is_VBZ often_RB experienced_VBN in_IN the_DT classification_NN of_IN these_DT operations_NNS ._.
With_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO ensure_VB one_CD uniform_NN system_NN in_IN the_DT different_JJ hospitals_NNS ,_, the_DT Inspector-General_JJ suggests_VBZ that_IN the_DT classification_NN sanctioned_VBD in_IN the_DT Resolution_NNP of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
129_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 21st_CD February_NNP 1877_CD ,_, should_MD be_VB revised_VBN ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ agrees_NNS in_IN these_DT remarks_NNS ,_, and_CC will_MD consult_VB the_DT Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Civil_NNP Hospitals_NNP with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO formulating_VBG the_DT alterations_NNS which_WDT may_MD be_VB recommended_VBN to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.
9_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Ezra_NNP Hospital_NNP 1,438_CD out-patients_NNS and_CC 236_CD in-patients_NNS ,_, most_JJS of_IN whom_WP were_VBD Jews_NNP ,_, were_VBD treated_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT in-door_JJ patients_NNS 153_CD were_VBD cured_VBN ,_, 43_CD relieved_VBD ,_, 26_CD otherwise_RB discharged_VBN ,_, and_CC 3_CD died_VBD ._.
These_DT figures_NNS show_VBP that_IN the_DT benefits_NNS conferred_VBN by_IN this_DT institution_NN are_VBP fully_RB appreciated_VBN by_IN the_DT Jewish_NNP community_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP is_VBZ glad_JJ to_TO find_VB that_IN the_DT nurses_NNS employed_VBN in_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS continue_VBP to_TO discharge_VB their_PRP$ duties_NNS thoroughly_RB and_CC well_RB ,_, and_CC has_VBZ read_VBN with_IN great_JJ pleasure_NN the_DT high_JJ praise_NN accorded_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Hilson_NNP to_TO the_DT ladies_NNS of_IN the_DT Clewer_NNP Sisterhood_NNP in_IN speaking_NN of_IN the_DT indefatigable_JJ services_NNS rendered_VBN by_IN them_PRP in_IN supervision_NN and_CC in_IN tending_VBG the_DT sick_NN ._.
Four_CD permanent_JJ nurses_NNS were_VBD appointed_VBN this_DT year_NN to_TO the_DT Eden_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, as_IN it_PRP was_VBD considered_VBN dangerous_JJ to_TO rely_VB exclusively_RB on_IN temporary_JJ nurses_NNS ,_, many_JJ of_IN whom_WP do_VBP not_RB possess_VB sufficient_JJ experience_NN in_IN the_DT work_NN ._.
Twelve_JJ European_JJ and_CC Eurasian_JJ nurses_NNS passed_VBD their_PRP$ examination_NN ,_, two_CD of_IN them_PRP with_IN great_JJ credit_NN ._.
11_CD ._.
The_DT invested_JJ capital_NN of_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP institutions_NNS shows_VBZ a_DT decrease_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
8,500_CD ;_: securities_NNS to_TO the_DT value_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
12,000_CD were_VBD withdrawn_VBN ,_, and_CC applied_VBD to_TO the_DT construction_NN of_IN a_DT new_JJ moribund_NN ward_NN in_IN the_DT native_JJ department_NN of_IN the_DT Howrah_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
The_DT total_JJ income_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, including_VBG the_DT opening_NN balance_NN ,_, amounted_VBD to_TO Rs_NNP ._.
5,21,390_CD ;_: of_IN this_DT sum_NN Rs_NNP ._.
3,46,858_CD were_VBD contributed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP ._.
The_DT total_JJ expenditure_NN ,_, excluding_VBG the_DT amount_NN invested_VBD ,_, was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
5,01,970_CD ,_, against_IN Rs_NNP ._.
4,27,082_CD in_IN 1888_CD ._.
The_DT increase_NN was_VBD mainly_RB due_JJ to_TO a_DT large_JJ expenditure_NN on_IN buildings_NNS and_CC repairs_NNS in_IN the_DT Campbell_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, while_IN the_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT amount_NN contributed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT entire_JJ cost_NN of_IN the_DT Police_NNP Hospital_NNP having_VBG been_VBN met_VBN from_IN Provincial_NNP Funds_NNP ._.
The_DT Inspector-_NNP General_NNP remarks_NNS that_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP Municipality_NNP contributed_VBD nothing_NN towards_IN the_DT Mayo_NNP institutions_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ time_NN to_TO consider_VB whether_IN ,_, in_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN Government_NNP has_VBZ undertaken_VBN all_DT charges_NNS on_IN account_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP Police_NNP ,_, the_DT Municipality_NNP should_MD not_RB relieve_VB the_DT Government_NNP of_IN its_PRP$ contribution_NN towards_IN the_DT medical_JJ charities_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN pointed_VBN out_RP to_TO Dr._NNP Hilson_NNP that_IN the_DT entire_JJ relief_NN afforded_VBD to_TO the_DT Municipality_NNP by_IN the_DT reduction_NN of_IN police_NN estimates_NNS is_VBZ hypothecated_VBN to_TO the_DT improvements_NNS of_IN the_DT Suburbs_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN this_DT argument_NN is_VBZ concerned_VBN ,_, it_PRP affords_VBZ no_DT ground_NN for_IN asking_VBG the_DT Municipality_NNP to_TO undertake_VB all_DT charges_NNS on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT medical_JJ relief_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ._.

2_CD ._.
The_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT Town_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP for_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN has_VBZ on_IN the_DT whole_JJ been_VBN somewhat_RB worse_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT preceding_NN years_NNS ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN can_MD be_VB judged_VBN from_IN the_DT returns_NNS of_IN mortality_NN given_VBN below_IN ._.
The_DT figures_NNS for_IN the_DT Town_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC Howrah_NNP are_VBP available_JJ for_IN the_DT last_JJ ten_JJ years_NNS ,_, but_CC those_DT of_IN the_DT amalgamated_JJ area_NN of_IN the_DT Suburbs_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP are_VBP given_VBN only_RB for_IN 1889_CD and_CC 1890_CD ,_, as_IN the_DT changes_NNS recently_RB made_VBD in_IN the_DT boundaries_NNS of_IN this_DT area_NN preclude_VBP the_DT possibility_NN of_IN drawing_VBG any_DT useful_JJ inferences_NNS from_IN a_DT more_RBR extended_JJ comparison_NN with_IN previous_JJ years_NNS ._.

While_IN there_EX was_VBD generally_RB a_DT marked_JJ diminution_NN in_IN the_DT deaths_NNS from_IN cholera_NN and_CC bowel-complaints_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN those_DT diseases_NNS coming_VBG under_IN the_DT heading_NN of_IN ``_`` Other_JJ causes_NNS ,_, ''_'' there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT very_RB appreciable_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT mortality_NN occasioned_VBN by_IN small-pox_JJ and_CC fevers_NNS ._.
The_DT active_JJ recrudescence_NN of_IN small-pox_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD noticed_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ last_JJ report_NN as_IN having_VBG occurred_VBN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN 1889_CD ,_, reached_VBD its_PRP$ culminating_NN point_NN in_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN 1890_CD ,_, and_CC gradually_RB died_VBD away_RB as_IN the_DT rains_NNS set_VBN in_IN ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN fevers_NNS were_VBD more_JJR than_IN usually_RB prevalent_JJ in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO some_DT extent_NN also_RB at_IN Howrah_NNP ,_, while_IN in_IN the_DT amalgamated_JJ area_NN of_IN the_DT Suburbs_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP there_EX was_VBD a_DT small_JJ decrease_NN of_IN these_DT affections_NNS ._.
The_DT total_JJ death-rate_NN for_IN Calcutta_NNP in_IN 1890_CD was_VBD 28.5_CD per_IN mille_NN ,_, which_WDT exceeds_VBZ that_IN of_IN the_DT past_JJ four_CD years_NNS ._.
At_IN Howrah_NNP it_PRP was_VBD 20.62_CD ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT decrease_NN as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT last_JJ two_CD years_NNS ,_, but_CC still_RB larger_JJR than_IN what_WP it_PRP was_VBD in_IN 1887_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT amal-_JJ gamated_JJ area_NN of_IN the_DT Suburbs_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP the_DT rate_NN was_VBD 47.5_CD ,_, against_IN 46.9_CD in_IN 1889_CD ._.

80_CD ._.
Howrah_NNP General_NNP Hospital.MUNICIPAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ._.
MEDICAL_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) cholera_NN are_VBP included_VBN ,_, 124_CD against_IN 126_CD ._.
The_DT death-rates_NNS in_IN the_DT Campbell_NNP and_CC Howrah_NNP Hospitals_NNP were_VBD 202.97_CD and_CC 220.02_CD respectively_RB ._.
These_DT rates_NNS ,_, though_IN they_PRP do_VBP not_RB materially_RB differ_VBP from_IN those_DT of_IN former_JJ years_NNS ,_, are_VBP lamentably_RB high_JJ ,_, and_CC are_VBP ascribed_VBN to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN these_DT hospitals_NNS receive_VBP a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN destitute_NN and_CC moribund_NN patients_NNS from_IN all_DT parts_NNS of_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC Howrah_NNP ._.
The_DT report_NN also_RB shows_VBZ a_DT sadly_RB high_JJ death-rate_NN among_IN the_DT children_NNS treated_VBN at_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, and_CC specially_RB among_IN female_JJ children_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Hilson_NNP observes_VBZ that_IN the_DT high_JJ death-rate_NN among_IN female_JJ children_NNS may_MD be_VB attributed_VBN partly_RB to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN fewer_JJR girls_NNS as_IN compared_VBN with_IN boys_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN for_IN treatment_NN ;_: but_CC this_DT view_NN seems_VBZ hardly_RB to_TO be_VB borne_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT total_JJ figures_NNS of_IN admissions_NNS ,_, deaths_NNS ,_, and_CC rate_NN of_IN mortality_NN shown_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ statement_NN :_: (_( 3_CD )_) It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB satisfactory_JJ to_TO notice_VB that_IN the_DT training_NN of_IN nurses_NNS and_CC dais_NN at_IN the_DT Eden_NNP Hospital_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB thoroughly_RB successful_JJ ._.

5,77,000_CD ,_, remained_VBD unchanged_JJ during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.

In_IN conclusion_NN ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP would_MD observe_VB that_IN this_DT report_NN ,_, which_WDT treats_VBZ of_IN the_DT most_RBS important_JJ medical_JJ institutions_NNS in_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, actually_RB conveys_VBZ less_JJR information_NN regarding_VBG their_PRP$ working_NN than_IN is_VBZ regularly_JJ given_VBN for_IN every_DT charitable_JJ dispensary_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, impossible_JJ to_TO ascertain_VB from_IN the_DT latter_JJ report_NN the_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN a_DT diet_JJ in_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP hospitals_NNS ,_, although_IN this_DT point_NN is_VBZ one_CD which_WDT has_VBZ a_DT most_RBS important_JJ bearing_NN on_IN hospital_JJ management_NN ,_, and_CC requires_VBZ constant_JJ watching_NN ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP hospitals_NNS formed_VBD the_DT subject_NN of_IN an_DT elaborate_JJ enquiry_NN about_IN twelve_CD years_NNS ago_RB ._.

Again_RB state-_JJ ment_NN No_NNP ._.
II_NNP ,_, giving_VBG the_DT race_NN and_CC sex_NN of_IN all_DT patients_NNS ,_, does_VBZ not_RB distinguish_VB the_DT institutions_NNS they_PRP resorted_VBD to_TO ,_, nor_CC does_VBZ it_PRP show_VB the_DT average_JJ daily_JJ attendance_NN for_IN each_DT class_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT proportions_NNS of_IN men_NNS ,_, women_NNS ,_, and_CC children_NNS making_VBG up_RP the_DT total_NN ._.

IV_NNP ,_, annexed_VBD to_TO the_DT Dispensaries_NNPS Report_NNP ._.

PARTICULAR_NNP DISEASES.9_NNP CALCUTTA_NNP MEDICAL_NNP INSTITUTIONS_NNP ._.
charnel_NN house_NN ,_, can_MD appreciate_VB the_DT improvements_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP under_IN the_DT solicitude_NN of_IN its_PRP$ various_JJ Superintendents_NNS under_IN whom_WP it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN placed_VBN ,_, and_CC yet_RB down_RB to_TO 1890_CD cases_NNS of_IN cholera_NN used_VBN to_TO occur_VB in_IN the_DT wards_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Birch_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT previous_JJ Superintendents_NNS ,_, looking_VBG to_TO the_DT dangers_NNS of_IN a_DT bazar_NN milk_NN and_CC butter_NN supply_NN ,_, recommended_VBD the_DT institution_NN of_IN a_DT large_JJ dairy_NN and_CC the_DT use_NN of_IN Danish_JJ butter_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD done_VBN ,_, but_CC still_RB cases_NNS continued_VBD ._.
A_DT sanitas_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO act_VB satisfactorily_RB ,_, was_VBD erected_VBN for_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN all_DT night-_JJ soil_NN ._.
Still_RB there_EX were_VBD cases_NNS in_IN the_DT wards_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT last_JJ thing_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN is_VBZ to_TO substitute_VB open_JJ drains_NNS for_IN all_DT covered_JJ drains_NNS within_IN the_DT com-_JJ pound_NN walls_NNS ._.
In_IN 1891_CD there_EX was_VBD not_RB a_DT single_JJ case_NN of_IN cholera_NN ,_, and_CC Dr._NNP Crombie_NNP attributes_VBZ the_DT exemption_NN to_TO these_DT open_JJ drains_NNS ,_, which_WDT can_MD now_RB be_VB kept_VBN clean_JJ and_CC which_WDT are_VBP incapable_JJ of_IN conveying_VBG sewer_NN gases_NNS to_TO the_DT wards_NNS in_IN conjunction_NN with_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ measures_NNS introduced_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ predecessors_NNS ._.
How_WRB far_RB this_DT additional_JJ precaution_NN will_MD prevent_VB future_JJ outbreaks_NNS remains_VBZ to_TO be_VB seen_VBN ,_, but_CC I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB that_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ defects_NNS of_IN the_DT hospital_NN have_VBP yet_RB been_VBN entirely_RB obviated_VBN ._.
The_DT Calcutta_NNP water-supply_NN is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN drinking_NN and_CC cooking_NN purposes_NNS ,_, but_CC I_PRP notice_VBP that_IN tank_NN water_NN is_VBZ still_RB used_VBN for_IN washing_VBG ._.
In_IN spite_NN ,_, too_RB ,_, of_IN great_JJ efforts_NNS to_TO keep_VB the_DT privies_NNS clean_VBP ,_, I_PRP confess_VBP I_PRP should_MD like_VB to_TO see_VB them_PRP remodelled_VBN on_IN the_DT plan_NN adopted_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Birch_NNP at_IN the_DT Medical_NNP College_NNP ._.
Until_IN these_DT two_CD defects_NNS are_VBP remedied_VBN ,_, this_DT hospital_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB said_VBD to_TO be_VB in_IN a_DT perfectly_RB sanitary_JJ condition_NN ._.
16_CD ._.
In_IN a_DT similar_JJ manner_NN cholera_NN used_VBN to_TO appear_VB among_IN the_DT patients_NNS under_IN treatment_NN in_IN the_DT Campbell_NNP Hospital_NNP ._.
By_IN the_DT introduction_NN of_IN a_DT pure_JJ water-supply_NN and_CC other_JJ sanitary_JJ arrangements_NNS a_DT great_JJ improvement_NN was_VBD effected_VBN until_IN 1890_CD ,_, when_WRB I_PRP was_VBD able_JJ to_TO report_VB that_IN not_RB a_DT single_JJ case_NN had_VBD arisen_VBN in_IN the_DT hospital_NN during_IN that_DT year_NN ._.
In_IN 1891_CD ,_, however_RB ,_, seven_CD fresh_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD among_IN the_DT patients_NNS ,_, due_JJ ,_, as_IN Dr._NNP Cobb_NNP thinks_VBZ ,_, to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN bad_JJ milk_NN ,_, but_CC ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP pointed_VBN out_RP above_IN ,_, the_DT defective_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT latrines_NNS may_MD have_VB also_RB been_VBN an_DT important_JJ factor_NN in_IN determining_VBG the_DT outbreak_NN ._.
17_CD ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT Mayo_NNP Native_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, I_PRP am_VBP told_VBD that_IN cases_NNS of_IN cholera_NN used_VBN to_TO occur_VB in_IN hospital_JJ some_DT years_NNS ago_RB ,_, but_CC there_EX are_VBP none_NN now_RB ,_, their_PRP$ disappearance_NN being_VBG coincident_JJ with_IN the_DT improvement_NN of_IN the_DT drinking-water_NN ,_, and_CC more_JJR particularly_RB with_IN the_DT improved_JJ system_NN of_IN latrines_NNS adopted_VBN some_DT years_NNS ago_RB by_IN Dr._NNP Sanders_NNP ._.
18_CD ._.
In_IN every_DT outbreak_NN of_IN cholera_NN ,_, whether_IN in_IN a_DT hospital_NN or_CC elsewhere_RB ,_, there_EX are_VBP always_RB three_CD factors_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT presence_NN of_IN all_DT three_CD is_VBZ necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT outbreak_NN ._.
The_DT first_JJ is_VBZ the_DT introduction_NN of_IN the_DT poison_NN or_CC germ_NN ,_, the_DT second_JJ is_VBZ a_DT suitable_JJ soil_NN for_IN the_DT growth_NN and_CC development_NN of_IN the_DT poison_NN or_CC germ_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT third_JJ is_VBZ some_DT condition_NN ,_, meteorological_JJ or_CC seasonal_JJ ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ essential_JJ for_IN the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT germ_NN in_IN the_DT soil_NN ._.
Living_VBG in_IN the_DT endemic_JJ area_NN ,_, the_DT prevention_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ ,_, i.e._FW ,_, the_DT introduction_NN of_IN the_DT germ_NN ,_, is_VBZ difficult_JJ ,_, but_CC probably_RB not_RB impossible_JJ ,_, and_CC hence_RB the_DT necessity_NN for_IN care_NN for_IN the_DT purity_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, milk_NN ,_, and_CC food_NN supplies_NNS ._.
The_DT third_JJ we_PRP can_MD not_RB control_VB ,_, but_CC with_IN the_DT second_JJ we_PRP are_VBP able_JJ to_TO deal_VB in_IN the_DT manner_NN pointed_VBD out_RP in_IN the_DT Sanitary_JJ reports_NNS of_IN the_DT Army_NNP Sanitary_NNP Commission_NNP ,_, especially_RB for_IN 1889_CD ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN published_VBN in_IN 1891_CD ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT duty_NN of_IN each_DT Superintendent_NNP to_TO gradually_RB work_VB his_PRP$ hospital_NN up_RB to_TO the_DT necessary_JJ degree_NN of_IN sanitary_JJ perfection_NN as_IN each_DT defect_NN becomes_VBZ patent_NN ._.
The_DT practical_JJ immunity_NN of_IN the_DT European_JJ residents_NNS of_IN Calcutta_NNP of_IN late_JJ years_NNS from_IN cholera_NN is_VBZ an_DT instance_NN of_IN how_WRB much_JJ can_MD be_VB done_VBN ,_, even_RB by_IN such_JJ imperfect_JJ measures_NNS of_IN sanitation_NN as_IN those_DT which_WDT the_DT Calcutta_NNP Municipality_NNP offers_VBZ to_TO persons_NNS who_WP are_VBP in_IN a_DT position_NN to_TO avail_VB themselves_PRP of_IN them_PRP ._.
19_CD ._.
As_IN with_IN cholera_NN so_RB with_IN small-pox_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS infectious_JJ of_IN the_DT exanthematous_JJ fevers_NNS ,_, we_PRP know_VBP that_IN in_IN India_NNP its_PRP$ prevalence_NN is_VBZ practically_RB confined_VBN to_TO two_CD months_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP recurs_VBZ with_IN increased_JJ virulence_NN every_DT fourth_JJ or_CC fifth_JJ year_NN in_IN England_NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN India_NNP Our_PRP$ knowledge_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, of_IN the_DT laws_NNS which_WDT determine_VBP this_DT recrudescence_NN is_VBZ still_RB rudimentary_JJ ,_, but_CC we_PRP happily_RB possess_VBD a_DT prophylactic_JJ for_IN this_DT disease_NN in_IN vaccination_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, if_IN it_PRP were_VBD only_RB fully_RB accepted_VBN by_IN the_DT people_NNS and_CC efficiently_RB carried_VBD out_RP ,_, would_MD make_VB a_DT knowledge_NN of_IN these_DT laws_NNS ,_, however_RB interesting_NN ,_, almost_RB superfluous_JJ ._.

STATEMENT_NNP V_NNP ,_, PART_NNP IMUNICIPAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ._.
MEDICAL_NNP ._.
No_DT ._.
157T.-M._JJ DARJEELING_NNP ,_, THE_NNP 28TH_CD MAY_NNP 1892_CD ._.
RESOLUTION_NNP ._.
READ_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) increased_VBD from_IN 1553.14_CD to_TO 1671.98_CD ,_, and_CC that_IN of_IN indoor_JJ patients_NNS from_IN 1202.93_CD to_TO 1205.67_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN an_DT outdoor_JJ department_NN was_VBD opened_VBN at_IN the_DT Eden_NNP Hospital_NNP ,_, and_CC though_IN the_DT attendance_NN was_VBD not_RB as_RB large_JJ as_IN might_MD have_VB been_VBN expected_VBN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ every_DT reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN it_PRP will_MD improve_VB as_IN the_DT dispensary_JJ comes_VBZ to_TO be_VB more_RBR generally_RB known_VBN ._.
Of_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN patients_NNS ,_, both_DT indoor_NN and_CC outdoor_NN ,_, treated_VBN in_IN all_PDT the_DT hospitals_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, 153,705_CD were_VBD men_NNS ,_, 34,678_CD women_NNS ,_, and_CC 56,753_CD children_NNS ._.
The_DT corresponding_JJ figures_NNS for_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN were_VBD 143,722_CD ,_, 33,017_CD and_CC 55,696_CD ._.
More_JJR than_IN 50_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT patients_NNS treated_VBN were_VBD Hindus_NNP ,_, next_JJ in_IN order_NN coming_VBG Muhammadans_NNS ,_, Eurasians_NNPS ,_, Europeans_NNPS ,_, and_CC other_JJ classes_NNS ._.
Fewer_JJR Europeans_NNS sought_JJ relief_NN at_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS during_IN 1891_CD than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT death-rate_NN among_IN all_PDT the_DT patients_NNS under_IN treatment_NN during_IN 1891_CD was_VBD 127_CD per_IN mille_NN against_IN 124_CD in_IN 1890_CD ,_, excluding_VBG the_DT patients_NNS treated_VBD for_IN eye-diseases_NNS ._.
This_DT includes_VBZ deaths_NNS from_IN cholera_NN ,_, without_IN which_WDT the_DT death-rate_NN would_MD be_VB 113_CD against_IN 114_CD per_IN mille_NN ._.
The_DT average_JJ death-rate_JJ in_IN English_JJ hospi-_JJ tals_NNS is_VBZ stated_VBN to_TO be_VB 80_CD per_IN thousand_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN French_JJ hospitals_NNS 95_CD ._.
In_IN 1882_CD the_DT death-rate_NN in_IN St._NNP Bartholomew_NNP 's_POS Hospital_NNP in_IN London_NNP was_VBD as_RB high_JJ as_IN 120_CD ,_, the_DT Edinburgh_NNP rate_NN being_VBG 105_CD ._.
As_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, the_DT death-rates_NNS were_VBD highest_JJS in_IN the_DT Howrah_NNP and_CC Campbell_NNP Hospitals_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ natural_JJ ,_, seeing_VBG that_IN these_DT are_VBP the_DT refuges_NNS to_TO which_WDT emigrants_NNS taken_VBN ill_RB in_IN the_DT depÃ´ts_NN ,_, moribund_NN cases_NNS found_VBN in_IN the_DT streets_NNS ,_, and_CC pauper_NN patients_NNS generally_RB are_VBP sent_VBN ._.
